data.584984812459776a704a82a6 Description: An open-type reflex sight designed for precision aiming of sport and hunting weapons at different types of targets, including the fast-moving ones. Manufactured by VOMZ.
data.5857a8b324597729ab0a0e7d Name: セキュアコンテナ Beta
data.5857a8b324597729ab0a0e7d Description: A medium-sized secure container used by PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.
data.5857a8bc2459772bad15db29 Name: セキュアコンテナ Gamma
data.5857a8bc2459772bad15db29 Description: A unique secure container used only by veteran PMCs formerly deployed in Tarkov.
data.587de4282459771bca0ec90b Description: A standard-issue threaded barrel for SIG Sauer P226 9x19 pistols.
data.587de5ba2459771c0f1e8a58 Name: P226 スレッドプロテクションキャップ
data.587de5ba2459771c0f1e8a58 Description: A threading protection cap for the P226 9x19 barrel.
data.587df3a12459772c28142567 Description: A standard 7.62x39 10-round magazine designed for the SKS carbine. The magazine is installed into the rifle internally and cannot be ejected on the spot, so it's not recommended to take multiple of them into a raid.
data.587df583245977373c4f1129 Description: A 20-round polymer detachable SKS magazine for 7.62x39 cartridges.
data.587e02ff24597743df3deaeb Description: Molot OP-SKS Carbine is designed for loading with 7,62x39 — the most popular ammunition. The weight and dimensions make the carbine ergonomic for shooters of any age and height. It has been used for all types of traditional Russian hunting for more than 50 years. Tested on predators in Africa, Southeast Asia, Central America, Middle East.
data.587e0531245977466077a0f7 Description: Molot製の標準的な木製 OP-SKSストック。
data.587e08ee245977446b4410cf Description: A mount for installation of sights and other additional devices on the OP-SKS carbines.
data.588200af24597742fa221dfb Description: A standard factory-produced 610mm barrel for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.588200c224597743990da9ed Description: A standard factory-produced 660mm barrel for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.588200cf2459774414733d55 Description: A standard factory-produced 710mm barrel for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.58820d1224597753c90aeb13 Description: A 12/70 slug shell for 12 gauge shotguns.
data.5882163224597757561aa920 Description: A 7-shell magazine extension tube for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.5882163824597757561aa922 Description: A 6-shell magazine extension tube for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.5882163e24597758206fee8c Description: A 5-shell magazine extension tube for MP-153 12 gauge shotguns.
data.588226d124597767ad33f787 Description: The Magpul AFG (Angled Fore Grip) tactical grip enables a more natural grip against the barrel axis. Thanks to that, recoil is reduced and weapon control is improved. Black version.
data.588226dd24597767ad33f789 Description: The Magpul AFG (Angled Fore Grip) tactical grip enables a more natural grip against the barrel axis. Thanks to that, recoil is reduced and weapon control is improved. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.588226e62459776e3e094af7 Description: The Magpul AFG (Angled Fore Grip) tactical grip enables a more natural grip against the barrel axis. Thanks to that, recoil is reduced and weapon control is improved. Forest Green version.
data.588226ef24597767af46e39c Description: The Magpul AFG (Angled Fore Grip) tactical grip enables a more natural grip against the barrel axis. Thanks to that, recoil is reduced and weapon control is improved. Olive Drab version.
data.58864a4f2459770fcc257101 Description: A 9x19mm Parabellum PSO gzh cartridge with a 7.5 gram bullet in a bimetallic case; intended for sport shooting and hunting. Despite the low muzzle velocity of the bullet, it has considerable stopping power effect, thanks to its exceptional expansion capability after hitting the target.
data.5887431f2459777e1612938f Description: A 7.62x54mm R LPS gzh (GRAU Index - 57-N-323S) cartridge with a 9.6 gram steel core bullet with a lead cladding and a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case. The LPS cartridge (Lyógkaya Púlya so Stal'ným serdéchnikom - "Light Steel core Bullet") was introduced into service in 1953 for Soviet 7.62x54mm R caliber weaponry, and over the years has undergone numerous changes in the materials used for its construction. Thanks to its steel core, it is capable of piercing through basic and intermediate ballistic body protections in addition to providing a considerable stopping power effect, however, it has a high bounce probability off various surfaces.
data.588892092459774ac91d4b11 Name: Lobaev Arms DVL-10 7.62x51 bolt-action sniper rifle
data.588892092459774ac91d4b11 Description: DVL-10 is a lightweight, compact, and silenced rifle in proprietary and current military subsonic calibers. Developed for special service and combat missions where exceptional accuracy and range are needed. Equipped with a standard Lobaev Arms foldable buttstock and Lobaev Hummer Barrels stainless steel match-grade barrel.
data.5888945a2459774bf43ba385 Description: A 500 mm long 7.62x51 match-grade stainless steel barrel with an integral sound suppressor manufactured by LOBAEV Hummer Barrels for the DVL-10 sniper rifle.
data.5888956924597752983e182d Description: A 660mm long 7.62x51 match-grade stainless steel barrel manufactured by LOBAEV Hummer Barrels for the DVL-10 M2 sniper rifle.
data.5888961624597754281f93f3 Description: The Harris HBR ultralight foldable bipod with a spring retraction mechanism. Used by service operators and civilian shooters worldwide.
data.5888976c24597754281f93f5 Description: A standard-issue handguard for the DVL-10 M2 sniper rifle, manufactured by Lobaev Arms.
data.5888988e24597752fe43a6fa Description: A standard-issue DVL-10 sniper rifle magazine by Lobaev Arms, for 7.62x51 cartridges.
data.5888996c24597754281f9419 Description: A standard-issue DVL-10 M2 sniper rifle muzzle brake, manufactured by Lobaev Arms.
data.58889c7324597754281f9439 Description: A standard-issue muzzle device for the DVL-10 sniper rifle, manufactured by Lobaev Arms.
data.58889d0c2459775bc215d981 Description: A standard-issue universal stock for sniper rifles manufactured by Lobaev Arms.
data.588b56d02459771481110ae2 Name: AR-15 Daniel Defense RIS II 9.5 handguard
data.588b56d02459771481110ae2 Description: The Daniel Defense RIS II 9.5 foregrip is a part of the SOPMOD Block II program to replace the standard M4CQBR or Mk18 foregrips in the US SOCOM service. It's made with light but durable aircraft aluminum alloy and comes equipped with 4 mounts for the installation of additional devices and accessories. This foregrip option is incompatible with the M203 UBGL.
data.58948c8e86f77409493f7266 Description: The SIG Sauer MPX submachine gun boasts an unprecedented operation speed in the familiar form factor of the AR platform. Short-stroke gas piston allows SIG MPX to use the full range of 9 mm ammunition without any adjustments to the gas valve. The full-sized mount provides the means of installing a wide range of scopes and sighting devices.
data.58949dea86f77409483e16a8 Description: The A2 Bird Cage flash hider, designed for installation on MPX 9x19 SMGs, manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.58949edd86f77409483e16a9 Description: A retracting handle with two latches for MPX-based weapons. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.58949fac86f77409483e16aa Description: A retracting handle with one latch for MPX-based weapons. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a05586f774094708ef75 Description: A standard 30-round capacity semitransparent 9x19mm MPX magazine, manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a13e86f7742405482982 Description: A telescopic retractable stock for early issues of MCX/MPX manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a2c386f77427140b8342 Description: A 203mm long barrel for MPX-based weapons chambered for 9x19 ammunition.
data.5894a42086f77426d2590762 Description: A 1st generation handguard for the SIG MPX submachine gun. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a51286f77426d13baf02 Description: A polymer MPX pistol grip is fit for installation on the first and second generations of MPX. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a5b586f77426d2590767 Description: A 1st generation upper receiver for the SIG MPX submachine gun, manufactured by SIG Sauer. Features a mount for attaching additional equipment.
data.5894a73486f77426d259076c Description: A detachable flip-up front sight for MPX SMGs, installed on the mount. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.5894a81786f77427140b8347 Description: A detachable flip-up rear sight for MPX SMGs, installed on the mount. Manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.58a56f8d86f774651579314c Description: The 2 inch SIG Sauer GEN1 handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional equipment on the 1st generation SIG MPX handguard.
data.58a5c12e86f7745d585a2b9e Description: The 4 inch SIG Sauer GEN1 handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional equipment on the 1st generation SIG MPX handguard.
data.58ac1bf086f77420ed183f9f Description: An adapter for attaching telescopic tube stocks to the rail mount, manufactured by SIG Sauer.
data.58ac60eb86f77401897560ff Description: 黒いウールのバラクラバはただ顔を温めるだけではなく、普段は大人しい人々の義憤にも火をつけ、大胆な行動へと走らせる。
data.58aeaaa886f7744fc1560f81 Description: A special 165mm long barrel for the MPX-SD. Chambered for 9x19 ammunition.
data.58aeac1b86f77457c419f475 Description: An integrated sound suppressor manufactured by SIG Sauer for the special "silent" version of the MPX, designated as MPX-SD.
data.58c157be86f77403c74b2bb6 Description: The TangoDown Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical grip is a short grip for use with weapons in close and extra close quarters combat. It ideally fits assault shotguns and also contains a compartment for batteries or SPTA. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.58c157c886f774032749fb06 Description: The TangoDown Stubby BGV-MK46K tactical grip is a short grip for use with weapons in close and extra close quarters combat. It ideally fits assault shotguns and also contains a compartment for batteries or SPTA. Stealth Gray version.
data.58d2664f86f7747fec5834f6 Description: Weaver レイル上にLeupold DeltaPointシリーズを取り付けるためのマウントベース。
data.58d268fc86f774111273f8c2 Name: Leupold DeltaPoint リフレックスサイト
data.58d268fc86f774111273f8c2 Description: Leupold製のコンパクトなDeltaPoint リフレックスサイトはその汎用性が高く評価されている。元々は射撃競技用のポンプアクションショットガンのサイトとして開発されたが、後に様々な武器に使用されるようになった。ショットガンやピストルといった武器からアサルトライフルまで適用の範囲は広く、メインサイトとしても予備のサイトとしても使用が可能だ。どのような場面であれ良好な成績を示すだろう。
data.58d2912286f7744e27117493 Description: A standard rubber butt-pad for the Magpul MOE Carbine stock series. However, it can also be installed on other models of the series.
data.58d2946386f774496974c37e Description: A drop-in replacement buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.58d2946c86f7744e271174b5 Description: A drop-in replacement buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Foliage Green version.
data.58d2947686f774485c6a1ee5 Description: A drop-in replacement buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Olive Drab version.
data.58d2947e86f77447aa070d53 Description: A drop-in replacement buttstock for AR-15/M16 carbines by Magpul Original Equipment. Uses mil-spec sized receiver extension tubes. Frame profile avoids snagging and shields the release latch to prevent accidental activation, includes a standard 0.30" thick rubber butt-pad to prevent slippage even with body armor or modular gear. Stealth Gray version.
data.58d399e486f77442e0016fe7 Name: Aimpoint Micro T-1 リフレックスサイト
data.58d399e486f77442e0016fe7 Description: Aimpoint社のMicro T-1リフレックスサイトは様々な銃に使用されており、ときには弓に使われることさえある。軽量でコンパクト、それでいて堅牢なサイトだ。
data.58d39b0386f77443380bf13c Name: Aimpoint Micro ハイスペーサー
data.58d39b0386f77443380bf13c Description: The Micro Spacer High mount raises the height of the optical axis. Made to work with the Aimpoint Micro red dot sights.
data.58d39d3d86f77445bb794ae7 Description: The Aimpoint Micro Standard Mount base for T-1 and H-1 reflex sights of the Micro series.
data.58d3db5386f77426186285a0 Name: M67 ハンドグレネード
data.58d3db5386f77426186285a0 Description: M67グレネード（M67 破片手榴弾）はアメリカ製の手榴弾で、対人戦での使用を想定して開発され1969年に米軍に正式採用された。
data.58dd3ad986f77403051cba8f Description: A 7.62x51mm NATO M80 cartridge with a 9.5 gram lead-antimony alloy core bullet with a bimetallic jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge was adopted in the United States Armed Forces as a replacement for the 7.62x51mm NATO M59 cartridge after the Vietnam War as standard ammunition, as it provides a considerable stopping power effect as well as being able to pierce through basic and intermediate body ballistic protections. However, it has a high bounce probability on various surfaces.
data.5900b89686f7744e704a8747 Description: A paper plan map of Priozersk Natural Reserve.
data.5909e99886f7740c983b9984 Description: USB充電器。かつては生活になくてはならないものだった。
data.590a358486f77429692b2790 Description: 充電を行うことによって繰り返し使用できる蓄電池。放電過程では内部の化学エネルギーが電気エネルギーに変換されるが、逆方向に電流を流すことで電気エネルギーを化学エネルギーに変換して充電できる。様々な電子機器や装置に使用されるほか、医療や産業などの分野でもバックアップ用の電源として広く利用されている。
data.590a373286f774287540368b Description: "ドライアルコール" とも呼ばれる固形燃料は、ヘキサメチレンテトラミンを少量のワックスで固めたものだ。キャンプなどに持ち込まれるほか、軍隊や救助隊が野外で食品を加熱したり調理する際に使用されている。
data.590a386e86f77429692b27ab Name: 故障したハードディスク
data.590a386e86f77429692b27ab Description: ランダムアクセスの記憶装置。大半のコンピュータのメインデータドライブとして使用されている。ハードウェアの専門家は壊れたディスクから制御装置や電磁石を回収し、他の電子機器に再利用しているようだ。
data.590a391c86f774385a33c404 Description: 手製の電磁石。きちんと動く電子機器や電動機が不足している状況においては、とても貴重なものだ。
data.590a3b0486f7743954552bdb Description: あらゆる電子機器に使われているコンポーネント。電子回路を作るうえで欠かせないものだ。
data.590a3c0a86f774385a33c450 Description: ガソリンエンジンで使用される点火プラグ。エンジンの燃焼サイクルのうち燃焼工程になる度に電極間で数千～数万ボルトの放電を行って燃料と空気の混合気に点火する。
data.590a3cd386f77436f20848cb Description: 一般的な白熱電球と比べて発光効率（電力に対して光源から発する全光束の効率を評価する指標）が大幅に向上している省エネルギーの電球形蛍光灯。白熱電球と交換することで消費電力を抑え環境保護にも貢献できる。
data.590a3d9c86f774385926e510 Description: 家庭用のUVランプは、可視光線より短くX線よりも長い、人の目では見えない波長の光を放つ電球の一種だ。紫外線は人間とすべての動物に有益な効果を持っており、風邪のようなウイルス性で感染力のある病気を予防することにも役立つ。
data.590a3efd86f77437d351a25b Description: 複数種のガス濃度や成分を定性的・定量的に測定できる分析機器。環境保全のための調査や内燃機関の調整、医療など、幅広い分野で活用されている。
data.590c2b4386f77425357b6123 Description: ワイヤーを掴んだり、動かしたり、切断するための工具。
data.590c2c9c86f774245b1f03f2 Description: 長さを測るための道具で、計測部が湾曲した薄い金属製のテープになっている巻尺。建設や改修工事の現場では欠かせないものだ。
data.590c2d8786f774245b1f03f3 Description: ねじ部品（一般的には頭部分に切れ込みのあるねじ）を締めたり緩めたりするための工具。通常は先端がプラスの形になった金属の棒にプラスチックか木製のグリップが付いている。
data.590c2e1186f77425357b6124 Description: 様々な工具がセットになった修理工のバッグ。
data.590c311186f77424d1667482 Description: 両口スパナ。単純な作りの工具だが、ほぼすべての技術分野で、あらゆる機械や装置の組み立てに使われている。
data.590c31c586f774245e3141b2 Description: 建設作業用の釘が入った箱。いざという時には仮の住まいや寝床、その他の組み立てにも役立つだろう。
data.590c346786f77423e50ed342 Name: ゼノモーフ シーリングフォーム
data.590c346786f77423e50ed342 Description: "ゼノモーフ" はスプレーノズルで噴射できるため、使い勝手の良い吹き付け専用の発泡ウレタンフォームだ。泡が固まると2倍の体積に膨張するうえ力学的な強度もあり、木材やコンクリート、石材、金属など、ほとんどの建築資材に対して優れた接着力を発揮する。発泡剤としてフロンガスを使用しておらず、シーリング作業においても信頼性やコストパフォーマンスが高い。
data.590c35a486f774273531c822 Name: シュストリロ シーリングフォーム
data.590c35a486f774273531c822 Description: 専用のウレタンガンに装着して使用する発泡ウレタンフォーム。出力、耐久性、安定性など、様々な点で高い品質を誇る "シュストリロ" の製品は、優れた成果も保証してくれる。
data.590c37d286f77443be3d7827 Description: 補強されたケースに入った SAS ハードドライブ。軍需産業の記憶装置として使用されていた。
data.590c392f86f77444754deb29 Description: ソリッドステートドライブ。書き込み / 読み込みの速度に優れた記憶装置だ。
data.590c595c86f7747884343ad7 Name: ガスマスクのフィルター
data.590c595c86f7747884343ad7 Description: GP-7 ガスマスク用のメタルケースに収められた GP-7k FPK フィルター。
data.590c5a7286f7747884343aea Description: 弾薬を作るために必要な火薬の入ったボトル。この "カイト" はニトロセルロースと静電気の発生を抑制するためのグラファイトを含有していることが特徴だ。
data.590c5bbd86f774785762df04 Description: WD-40 (Water Displacement-40th Attempt) は、工業用として開発された撥水性の高い防錆潤滑剤だ。現在では一般家庭でも様々な用途に使用されている。製品の主成分は炭化水素で、配合を40回目の試作で完成させたことが名前の由来になっているらしい。
data.590c5c9f86f77477c91c36e7 Description: WD-40 (Water Displacement-40th Attempt) は、工業用として開発された撥水性の高い防錆潤滑剤だ。現在では一般家庭でも様々な用途に使用されている。製品の主成分は炭化水素で、配合を40回目の試作で完成させたことが名前の由来になっているらしい。
data.590c5d4b86f774784e1b9c45 Name: イスクラ レーションパック
data.590c5d4b86f774784e1b9c45 Description: このレーションの小さなパッケージには、過酷な状況下で成人が1日に必要とするすべての栄養素が含まれている。
data.590c5f0d86f77413997acfab Name: MRE レーションパック
data.590c5f0d86f77413997acfab Description: MRE (Meal, Ready-to-Eat) は、アメリカ陸軍のために開発された個人用の戦闘糧食だ。パッケージは過酷な環境や風雨にも耐えうるよう設計されており保管状況を気にする必要はない。野外で空腹を満たすための様々な食料が入っている。
data.590c60fc86f77412b13fddcf Description: 書類や地図などを持ち歩くのに便利な本革製のショルダーバッグ。
data.590c621186f774138d11ea29 Name: 暗号化された USB フラッシュドライブ
data.590c621186f774138d11ea29 Description: セキュリティ機能付きのUSBメモリ。このタイプは TerraGroup の社員にも頻繁に使用されていたらしい。間違いなく機密情報が入っているはずだ。
data.590c62a386f77412b0130255 Name: 暗号化されたスライド式 USB フラッシュドライブ
data.590c62a386f77412b0130255 Description: "スライダーキー"と呼ばれる、スライド式キャップレス設計の暗号化された USB フラッシュドライブ。このタイプは TerraGroup の管理職が愛用していたものらしい。間違いなく重要な機密情報が入っているはずだ。
data.590c639286f774151567fa95 Description: 車種別の整備や点検方法など、技術的な情報が記載された整備要領書。
data.590c645c86f77412b01304d9 Description: 様々な人物の氏名や住所、電話番号といった個人情報が記された黒革の手帖。何かの役に立つかもしれない。
data.590c651286f7741e566b6461 Description: 様々な人物の氏名や住所、電話番号といった個人情報が記されたポケットサイズの手帳。この情報を欲しがる者もいるだろう。
data.590c657e86f77412b013051d Description: Sportsman Series Grizzly 応急処置キットには過酷な状況下で適切な治療を行うために必要なものがすべて揃っている。最高のファーストエイドキットの1つと言えるだろう。
data.590c661e86f7741e566b646a Name: カー ファーストエイドキット
data.590c661e86f7741e566b646a Description: 車載の応急処置キットは消火器と同様に、路上で緊急事態が発生した際の備えとして重要なものだ。
data.590c678286f77426c9660122 Name: IFAK ファーストエイドキット
data.590c678286f77426c9660122 Description: IFAK "アイファク" (Individual First Aid Kit of the United States Marine Corps) は、アメリカ合衆国の海兵隊で使用されている第3世代の個人用応急処置キット。洗練されたデザインで内容品も豊富だ。
data.590c695186f7741e566b64a2 Description: オーグメンチンは細菌感染症の治療に使用される複合抗生物質製剤だ。
data.590dde5786f77405e71908b2 Description: 頑丈な銀行ケース。見るからに価値のあるものが入っている。何度もこじ開けようとされたが失敗に終わったようだ。
data.590de71386f774347051a052 Name: アンティークのティーポット
data.590de71386f774347051a052 Description: 蒐集品としても希少価値の高いアンティークの銀製ティーセットの中の一品。

data.5929a2a086f7744f4b234d43 Name: UMTBS 6sh112スカウトスナイパー ベスト
data.5929a2a086f7744f4b234d43 Description: The Universal Modular Transport-Combat System (UMTBS) "Scout-sniper" is officially part of the equipment of the armed forces of the Russian Federation. The vest is designed with a modular approach and can be transformed to suit various specific combat tasks. This system includes the vest base, various purpose pouches, and backpacks. Due to the fact that the vest is based on the MOLLE system, it can be used with various compatible pouches beyond those included with the kit. The belt system has soft bumper pads, and its inside is made from breathable materials.
data.592c2d1a86f7746dbe2af32a Name: ANA Tactical Alpha チェストリグ
data.592c2d1a86f7746dbe2af32a Description: 高品質な"Alpha" チェストリグ。信頼性と機能性で完全に軍からの要求水準を満たしている。組み込まれたポーチとMOLLEストラップの組み合わせで膨大な数の必要な装備を携帯することができるようになっている。ベストは旧来のチェストリグとして設計されており、このタイプのベストではすべての装備品はベスト正面と両側面に位置している一方、背面には調整用ベルトとストラップがある。

data.59d6088586f774275f37482f Description: The AKM (Avtomát Kaláshnikova Modernizírovanny - Kalashnikov's Automatic Rifle Modernised) 7.62x39mm automatic rifle was adopted in 1959 to replace AK as a standard service weapon of the Soviet Army. Main differences compared to AK: enhanced accuracy range, lower weight, new stock, trigger, hammer retarder, muzzle compensator, and other design changes aimed at improving the efficiency of the rifle.
data.59d625f086f774661516605d Description: A standard 30-round metal magazine for 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons from 1955 onward. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.

data.59e0d99486f7744a32234762 Description: A 7.62x39mm BP gzh (GRAU Index - 7N23) cartridge with a 7.9 gram armor-piercing bullet with a hardened carbon steel core with lead cladding on the tip and a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case. This BP bullet (Bronebóynaya Púlya - "Armor-piercing Bullet") was developed in the 1990s based on the 7.62x39mm PS gzh cartridge to improve its design and penetration capabilities, as a longer and narrower reinforced steel core was chosen, allowing it to pierce through basic and intermediate body ballistic protections in addition to provide a significant stopping power effect, however, it has a significant bounce probability off various surfaces.
data.59e3556c86f7741776641ac2 Description: "Ox" は衣類の染み抜きや色素汚れに特化した漂白剤だ。これらに用いられる主成分は化学結合を断ち切るため、化学製品製造にも頻繁に利用されている。
data.59e3577886f774176a362503 Description: 箱入りの角砂糖。食料不足の状況下では貴重なもの。アルコール飲料の醸造にも使用できる。
data.59e358a886f7741776641ac3 Name: クリン ガラスクリーナー
data.59e358a886f7741776641ac3 Description: "クリン" は窓や鏡などのガラス面に使用する洗浄剤だ。自家製の化学製品の製造にも使用されている。
data.59e3596386f774176c10a2a2 Description: ゴキブリやアリを戦術的に全滅させるための戦闘用スプレー。ハイドアウトのメンテナンスに欠かせないものだ。
data.59e35abd86f7741778269d82 Description: 一般には "重曹" と呼ばれることが多い炭酸水素塩。通常は粒の細かい白色の粉末で食品業界や一般家庭では洗浄、脱臭などの目的や食品添加物に、医薬品としては胃酸を中和する制酸剤、酸による皮膚の火傷などに使用されている。
data.59e35cbb86f7741778269d83 Description: 屋外の電線、ケーブルだけでなく水撒き用ホースの保護にも使用できるコルゲートチューブ。ハイドアウトの拡張に役立つはずだ。
data.59e35de086f7741778269d84 Description: コードレスの電動ドリル。建築工事や家具の設置、修理などに使用される。
data.59e35ef086f7741777737012 Description: セルフタッピングネジは下穴に、直接メネジの溝を刻みながらねじ込んでいくことができる固着具だ。木板、石膏ボード、プラスチックパネルの施工に使用される。
data.59e3606886f77417674759a5 Description: 血液と同じ浸透圧をもつ生理食塩水。生理溶液にはいくつかの種類があるが、その成分や濃度は用途によって異なる。
data.59e361e886f774176c10a2a5 Description: 過酸化水素水は、傷口の洗浄や消毒のために医療現場で使用されている。
data.59e3639286f7741777737013 Description: 蒐集品としての価値が高い青銅製のライオンの置物。見た目にも美しく重厚な作りで、売っても飾って眺めても良い品だ。
data.59e3647686f774176a362507 Description: 双頭の鷲をかたどった芸術的な木製の置時計。希少で高価な品だ。
data.59e3658a86f7741776641ac4 Description: マカッサルエボニー（縞黒檀）と呼ばれる希少な木材を使用したアンティークの猫の彫像。
data.59e366c186f7741778269d85 Description: アクリル樹脂、メタクリル酸メチルを原料とするビニルポリマー、熱可塑性プラスチックなどの有機ガラスは、一般的に "プレキシグラス" という商品名で呼ばれている。
data.59e36c6f86f774176c10a2a7 Description: パーソナルコンピュータ用の 220V 電源ケーブル。
data.59e4cf5286f7741778269d8a Description: A 7.62x39mm T-45M1 gzh (GAU Index - 57-T-231PM1) cartridge with a 7.6 gram lead core tracer bullet with a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Red). This tracer cartridge is an upgraded version of the T-45 model (GAU Index - 57-T-231), as it provides longer distance tracing capabilities. And despite the rudimentary design of the bullet, it can pierce through basic ballistic body protections as well as some intermediate models in addition to provide a considerable stopping power effect, however, it has a high bounce probability off various surfaces.
data.59e4d24686f7741776641ac7 Description: A 7.62x39mm US gzh (GAU Index - 57-N-231U) cartridge with a 12.6 gram subsonic bullet with a pointed heat-strengthened steel core over a lead base with a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case with a reduced charge. This US cartridge (Umén'shennoy Skórosti - "Reduced Speed") was designed in the 1950s for use in conjunction with a suppressor, achieving an excellent noise reduction in addition to ensuring the cycle of Soviet 7.62x39mm caliber weaponry and, thanks to its design, the bullet is capable of pierce through basic ballistic body protections, however, it has a high bounce probability off various surfaces.
data.59e4d3d286f774176a36250a Description: A 7.62x39mm cartridge with an 8 gram lead core hollow-point (HP) bullet with a bimetallic semi-jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice. The bullet in this cartridge has an excellent expansion and impact energy that give it outstanding stopping power effects, as well as being able to cause substantial adverse effects on the target after impact, making it a good choice for hunting.
data.59e5d83b86f7745aed03d262 Description: A custom-cut ribbed metal 7.62x39mm 10-round magazine for AK-compatible systems. Made by sawing off a military magazine to comply with the Russian Federation's laws for use with civilian firearms. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.
data.59e5f5a486f7746c530b3ce2 Description: The 6P2 Sb-11 standard-issue 40-round 7.62x39 magazine for the RPK LMG from 1961 and onward, fits any AK-compatible weapon. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.
data.59e6152586f77473dc057aa1 Description: The Molot Vepr-KM/VPO-136 carbine is based on the well-known Kalashnikov AKM and has an almost identical appearance, weight, and overall dimensions. Designed for hunting of medium and big game, as well as for sporting use.
data.59e61eb386f77440d64f5daf Description: A standard muzzle brake/compensator manufactured by Molot Arms for VPO-136 Vepr KM 7.62x39 carbines. Also fits the AK family automatic rifles of the same caliber.
data.59e6227d86f77440d64f5dc2 Description: A standard-issue wooden stock for VPO-136 Vepr-KM carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e6284f86f77440d569536f Description: A standard wooden handguard for VPO-136 Vepr KM carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e62cc886f77440d40b52a1 Description: A bakelite Izhmash-manufactured pistol grip for AKM automatic rifles.
data.59e6318286f77444dd62c4cc Description: A bakelite pistol grip for AK assault rifles and compatible weapon systems, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e6449086f7746c9f75e822 Description: A standard-issue dust cover for AKM-type Vepr carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e649f986f77411d949b246 Description: A gas tube for AKM-type automatic rifles and Vepr carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms. Gas tubes channel the travel direction of gas piston.
data.59e6542b86f77411dc52a77a Description: A .366 TKM (9.55x39mm) FMJ cartridge with a 13 gram lead core bullet with a brass jacket in a steel case; intended for sport shooting and hunting. Although this cartridge is intended for small-game hunting, its design allows it to pierce through basic ballistic body protections in addition to providing an outstanding stopping power effect and being capable of causing severe adverse effects on the target after impact. Its design also allows it to be used in 7.62x39mm AK magazines without any problem.
data.59e655cb86f77411dc52a77b Description: A .366 TKM (9.55x39mm) EKO cartridge with a 6 gram bullet made entirely of zinc, in a steel case; intended for sport shooting and hunting. Although this cartridge is intended for small-game hunting, its design allows it to pierce through basic ballistic body protections as well as some intermediate models, in addition to providing a significant stopping power effect and being capable of causing severe adverse effects on the target after impact. Its design also allows it to be used in 7.62x39mm AK magazines without any problem.
data.59e6658b86f77411d949b250 Description: A .366 TKM (9.55x39mm) Geksa cartridge with a 15.5 gram lead core soft-point (SP) bullet with a brass semi-jacket in a steel case; intended for sport shooting and hunting. This bullet has a good initial expansion on impact due to the exposure of the lead core at the tip, giving it a superior stopping power effect of its caliber, in addition to being able to inflict substantial adverse effects on the target after impact. Its design also allows it to be used in 7.62x39mm AK magazines without any problem.
data.59e6687d86f77411d949b251 Description: The Molot VPO-209 carbine is based on the well-known Kalashnikov AKM and has an almost identical appearance, weight, and overall dimensions. It has a smooth bore barrel with the last 120 mm of the barrel being rifled (a so called "paradox"-bore). VPO-209 is chambered in .366 TKM, that together with the "paradox" rifling classifies the weapon as a shotgun under Russian law.
data.59e68f6f86f7746c9f75e846 Description: A 5.56x45mm NATO M856 cartridge with a 4.1 gram lead core tracer bullet with a copper jacket, in a brass case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Red). This cartridge was designed in the 1980s to provide tracing capabilities to the 5.56x45mm NATO caliber weaponry used by the United States Army when used in conjunction with the M855 cartridge. Despite not having a steel penetrator tip, compared to the M855, the bullet in this cartridge is capable of piercing basic ballistic body protections, it has a high probability of rebound on various surfaces.
data.59e6906286f7746c9f75e847 Description: A 5.56x45mm NATO M856A1 cartridge with a 3.6 gram copper alloy core tracer bullet with a copper jacket, in a brass case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Red). This cartridge was designed to provide tracing capabilities when used in conjunction with the 5.56x45mm NATO M855A1 cartridge and have a similar ballistic performance, being able to pierce basic body ballistic protections, as well as providing excellent results against intermediate models, however, it has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.
data.59e690b686f7746c9f75e848 Description: A 5.56x45mm NATO M995 cartridge with a 3.4 gram armor-piercing bullet with a tungsten carbide penetrator over an aluminum base with a copper jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge was designed during the 1990s to provide United States Army personnel with capabilities to pierce light covers and light vehicles, as well as basic and intermediate ballistic body protections, in addition to providing outstanding results against some specialized protection models. However, due to its design, it has a significant bounce probability on various surfaces.
data.59e6918f86f7746c9f75e849 Description: A 5.56x45mm NATO MK 255 Mod 0 (RRLP) cartridge with a 4 gram bullet with a copper/polymer composite core with a copper jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge was designed under the name of RRLP (Reduced Ricochet Limited Penetration) in order to substantially reduce collateral damage from ricochets and over-piercing during training and close-quarters operations, as well as providing a substantial stopping power effect.
data.59e6920f86f77411d82aa167 Description: A .223 Remington (5.56x45mm) FMJ cartridge with a 3.6 gram lead core bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice. Despite its rudimentary design and not having the full energy of an intermediate cartridge, the bullet is capable of piercing through basic ballistic body protections.
data.59e6927d86f77411da468256 Description: A .223 Remington (5.56x45mm) HP cartridge with a 3.6 gram lead core hollow-point bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a steel case; intended for hunting, home defense, and target practice. Despite not having the full energy of an intermediate cartridge, the bullet has a considerable stopping power effect as well as being able to cause substantial adverse effects on the target after impact, at the cost of penetration capabilities, even against basic ballistic protection.
data.59e7635f86f7742cbf2c1095 Name: BNTI Module-3M ボディアーマー
data.59e7635f86f7742cbf2c1095 Description: GOST-R 規格で クラス2 の防弾性能をもつ軽量な防弾ベスト。民間警備会社や現金輸送などで使用されている。
data.59e763f286f7742ee57895da Description: A large and brightly colored backpack that is perfect for tourists on a raid.
data.59e7643b86f7742cbf2c109a Description: The WARTECH gear rig consisting of the TV-106 Battle Belt and TV-109 heavy suspension system. The shoulder straps are reinforced with foam and have MOLLE straps, and the TV-109 combined with the TV-106 completes the belt system into a full-featured gear rig.
data.59e7708286f7742cbd762753 Description: The Ushanka ear flap hat is a classic hat worn by Russian people, or that is at least what most people from the west seem to believe.
data.59e770b986f7742cbd762754 Description: These anti-fragmentation glasses are designed to protect the eyes and part of user's face from shell fragments, drops of chemically aggressive liquids and oils, coarsely dispersed aerosols, thermal factors, atmospheric influences, and mechanical damages in all types of combat operations and during daily activities.
data.59e770f986f7742cbe3164ef Description: A standard military cap, worn by soldiers.
data.59e7711e86f7746cae05fbe1 Name: Kolpak-1S ライオットヘルメット
data.59e7711e86f7746cae05fbe1 Description: Kolpak-1S protects the head from the cold piercing-cutting weapons in a special class of protection GOST R50744-95, from fragmentation with an energy of impact up to 50 J, and also serves to reduce the dynamic loads arising from the above-mentioned means of destruction. Kolpak-1 protective helmets are recommended by the Interdepartmental Commission for equipping units of the patrol service, traffic police, OMON and other special units of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of Russia.
data.59e7715586f7742ee5789605 Description: レスピレーターマスク、または 防毒 / 防塵 マスクは、フィルターを通して空気中の有毒ガスや有害物質を除去する一般的な保護マスクだ。
data.59e77a2386f7742ee578960a Description: A 7.62x54mm R PS gzh (GRAU Index - 7N1) cartridge with a 9.8 gram bullet with a pointed steel core over a lead base with a bimetallic jacket, in a bimetallic case. This PS cartridge was developed by TsNIITochMash in the mid-1960s from the 7.62x54mm R LPS gzh cartridge specifically to increase its accuracy when fired from a sniper or designated marksman rifles, such as the SVD and its variants, being able of piercing through basic and intermediate ballistic body protections as well as providing an outstanding stopping power effect.
data.59e8977386f77415a553c453 Description: A standard rear sight for VPO-209 AKM carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e898ee86f77427614bd225 Description: A standard wooden handguard for VPO-209 AKM carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e89d0986f77427600d226e Description: A standard-issue wooden stock for VPO-209 AKM carbines, manufactured by Molot Arms.
data.59e8a00d86f7742ad93b569c Description: A thread protector for muzzle brake/compensator for VPO-209 AKM carbines. Also fits the AKM 7.62x39 series automatic rifles.
data.59eb7ebe86f7740b373438ce Description: The TOZ 6P29M mount, developed for a modified version of the VSS sniper rifle. It is installed on the VSS standard silencer and forms 3 rails intended for mounting additional equipment on the weapon.
data.59ecc28286f7746d7a68aa8c Description: The lock is designed to install the PT-1 and PT-3 stocks to a weapon. This model is designed for installation on the AKS-74 and AKS-74U folding assault rifles. Manufactured by Zenit.
data.59ecc3dd86f7746dc827481c Description: The PT-3 telescopic stock is mounted instead of the standard stock of AK-103, 104, 105, 74M, AKS74U, and PP Vityaz weapons. Features a length adjustment mechanism and an adjustable cheek. A special PT lock is required for installation. Manufactured by Zenit.
data.59ef13ca86f77445fd0e2483 Name: ジャックオーランタン タクティカル パンプキン ヘルメット
data.59ef13ca86f77445fd0e2483 Description: Jack-o'-lantern is here to protect you from the Evil.
data.59f32bb586f774757e1e8442 Description: ドッグタグは、戦闘中の負傷者や死亡者を迅速に識別する目的で使用される。これは民間軍事会社 "BEAR" のオペレーターが身に付けていたものだ。
data.59f32c3b86f77472a31742f0 Description: ドッグタグは、戦闘中の負傷者や死亡者を迅速に識別する目的で使用される。これは民間軍事会社 "USEC" のオペレーターが身に付けていたものだ。
data.59f8a37386f7747af3328f06 Name: Fortis Shift タクティカルグリップ
data.59f8a37386f7747af3328f06 Description: The Shift vertical grip integrates form with functionality. Its hybrid-designed shape works both as a regular foregrip and as a comfortable hand stop when going with the thumb over bore method. The grip allows you to handle the weapon with the confidence, and the organic design enables the operator to manipulate the rifle in a way that’s most comfortable at any given moment.
data.59f98b4986f7746f546d2cef Description: The SR-1MP pistol (GRAU index - 6P53), also known as "Gyurza" (Viper) or SPS ("Samozaryádnyy Pistolyét Serdyukóva" - Serdyukov Semiautomatic Pistol), was designed by P. Serdyukov and I. Belyaev with the powerful 9x21 cartridge to replace the APS machine pistol used by the special forces of the Russian Federation. This model can be fitted with a set of mounts to attach additional equipment, as well as work as a base for installing a suppressor.
data.59f99a7d86f7745b134aa97b Description: A standard 18-round 9x21 magazine for the SR-1MP pistol.
data.59f9cabd86f7743a10721f46 Description: The Saiga-9 carbine was developed as a semi-automatic variant of the PP-19-01 Vityaz SMG for civilian market and designed for purposes of shooting sports and plinking.
data.59f9d81586f7744c7506ee62 Name: Vortex Razor AMG UH-1 holographic sight
data.59f9d81586f7744c7506ee62 Description: The Vortex Razor AMG UH-1 holographic sight is not only made with futuristic design, but, according to its creators, is also a revolution among holographic and reflex sights.
data.59faf7ca86f7740dbe19f6c2 Description: 有名なブランド Roler の腕時計。ケース部分の素材はイエローゴールド (K18YG) 。
data.59faf98186f774067b6be103 Description: アルカリクリーナーは配管内やグリル、エンジンなどに付着した汚れを取り除くのに便利な洗浄剤だ。化学製品製造のオペレーターにも使用されている。
data.59fafb5d86f774067a6f2084 Description: プロパンは非常に危険な可燃性のガスで、溶接に使われるほか、ガスが供給されていない家屋や場所ではガスコンロやガスストーブの燃料としても使用されている。
data.59fafc5086f7740dbe19f6c3 Description: A 30-round polymer US Palm AK30 magazine for 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons. Black version.
data.59fafc9386f774067d462453 Description: A 30-round polymer US Palm AK30 magazine for 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.59fafd4b86f7745ca07e1232 Description: 様々な鍵をひとつにまとめて収納できる便利なツール。
data.59faff1d86f7746c51718c9c Description: 暗号通貨であるビットコインの現物（0.2BTC 相当）として使える金貨。
data.59fb016586f7746d0d4b423a Description: TARBank の堅牢なマネーケース。現金の保管にも最適。
data.59fb023c86f7746d0d4b423c Description: 武器や弾薬、パーツなどを収納するためのケース。
data.59fb042886f7746c5005a7b2 Description: あらゆるアイテムを収納できるケース。
data.59fb137a86f7740adb646af1 Name: Tromix Monster Claw 12ゲージ マズルブレーキ
data.59fb137a86f7740adb646af1 Description: The Monster Claw muzzle brake from Tromix significantly reduces recoil and can be used for breaking tempered glass.
data.59fb257e86f7742981561852 Description: The Zenit DTK-4M muzzle brake, manufactured from titanium alloy, is designed for installation on modern 7.62x39 AK assault rifles. Although positioned as a muzzle brake, it can only be purchased by the staff of particular authorities.
data.59fb375986f7741b681b81a6 Name: AK Krebs Custom UFM KeyMod handguard
data.59fb375986f7741b681b81a6 Description: The Krebs Custom UFM Keymod System lightweight aluminum handguard for AK family assault rifles with KeyMod slots for rail installation. The Kiba Arms VDM CS gas tube is required for installation.
data.59fc48e086f77463b1118392 Description: The Magpul RVG (Rail Vertical Grip) tactical grip. A common, unsophisticated, inexpensive, and ergonomically shaped vertical foregrip.
data.59ff346386f77477562ff5e2 Name: AKMS 7.62x39 アサルトライフル
data.59ff346386f77477562ff5e2 Description: AKMS (Avtomát Kaláshnikova Modernizírovanny Skladnóy - "Kalashnikov's Automatic rifle Modernised with foldable stock") 7.62x39 assault rifle (GRAU Index — 6P4) is a variant of the AKM rifle with a folding shoulder piece (stock). Folds forward-down, under the handguard. Designed specifically for airborne troops.
data.59ff3b6a86f77477562ff5ed Description: A folding shoulder piece assembly for AKMS automatic rifles, manufactured by Izhmash.
data.5a0060fc86f7745793204432 Description: A 30-round aluminum magazine for 7.62x39 AKMS and compatibles, nicknamed “Airborne”. Made of light aluminum alloy and reinforced by additional ribs. It's quite a rarity, as it was never in mass production. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.
data.5a0071d486f77404e23a12b2 Description: A wooden Izhmash-manufactured pistol grip for AK-compatible weapons. Originally installed on AKM and AKMS.
data.5a01ad4786f77450561fda02 Name: AK Kiba Arms VDM CS gas tube
data.5a01ad4786f77450561fda02 Description: A custom gas tube for specific AK family handguards.
data.5a01c29586f77474660c694c Description: A 30-round 6L10 magazine made with an AG-4S moulding compound, for 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.
data.5a0448bc86f774736f14efa8 Name: Key to the closed premises of the Health Resort
data.5a0448bc86f774736f14efa8 Description: A key to the closed premises of the Azure Coast Health Resort.
data.5a0abb6e1526d8000a025282 Description: Taktika Tula AK/AKM用マズルデバイスアダプター。近代的なマズルデバイスをAKやAKMに装着するために使用する。
data.5a0c27731526d80618476ac4 Name: Zarya スタングレネード
data.5a0c27731526d80618476ac4 Description: 一瞬のうちに大音響と閃光を発生させ、敵を制圧することを目的としたスタングレネード。犯罪者を逮捕するための特殊作戦や暴動の鎮圧に使用される。
data.5a0c59791526d8dba737bba7 Name: AK GP-25 accessory kit recoil pad
data.5a0c59791526d8dba737bba7 Description: A recoil pad from the standard accessories’ kit of GP-25 under-barrel grenade launcher for AK automatic rifles, also known as the "Overshoe". Despite its original purpose, it can be installed on many AK models for recoil damping, and thus made it into common use.
data.5a0d63621526d8dba31fe3bf Description: PBS-1 (Pribór Besshúmnoy Strel'bý - "Silent Firing Device") is a sound suppressor manufactured by TsNIITochMash for noiseless and flash-free fire with 7.62x39mm AK family assault rifles.
data.5a0d716f1526d8000d26b1e2 Description: A slot-like flash suppressor designed specifically for AKML arms system to reduce the muzzle flash flare on the NSP-3 night vision scope.
data.5a0dc45586f7742f6b0b73e3 Name: 保養所 西棟診療室104号室の鍵
data.5a0dc45586f7742f6b0b73e3 Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" 西棟の診療室104号室の鍵。
data.5a0dc95c86f77452440fc675 Name: 保養所 西棟休憩室112号室の鍵
data.5a0dc95c86f77452440fc675 Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" 西棟の休憩室112号室の鍵。
data.5a0ea64786f7741707720468 Name: 保養所 東棟診療室107号室の鍵
data.5a0ea64786f7741707720468 Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" 東棟の診療室107号室の鍵。
data.5a0ea69f86f7741cd5406619 Name: 保養所 東棟診療室108号室の鍵
data.5a0ea69f86f7741cd5406619 Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" 東棟の診療室108号室の鍵。
data.5a0ea79b86f7741d4a35298e Name: 保養所 保管室の鍵
data.5a0ea79b86f7741d4a35298e Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" にあるすべての保管室の共用の鍵。
data.5a0eb38b86f774153b320eb0 Description: ロックボタンの付いた折りたたみ式の SMW の車の鍵。
data.5a0eb6ac86f7743124037a28 Description: 保養所 "アズール・コースト" 近くにあるコテージの裏口の鍵。
data.5a0eb980fcdbcb001a3b00a6 Name: AKMBシステム リアサイト
data.5a0eb980fcdbcb001a3b00a6 Description: A special rear sight leaf for use with PBS-1 and the “US” cartridge of the AKMB (AKMSB) arms system.
data.5a0ec13bfcdbcb00165aa685 Name: AKMN 7.62x39 アサルトライフル
data.5a0ec13bfcdbcb00165aa685 Description: AKMN (Avtomat Kalashnikova Modernizirovanny Nochnoy - "Kalashnikov's Automatic Rifle Modernised Night") is a small arms system consisting of a modified AKM automatic rifle with a dovetail mount for installation of the NSP family night vision scopes — NSP-2/3/3A, NSPU, NSPU-M.

data.5a154d5cfcdbcb001a3b00da Name: Ops-Core FAST MT Super High Cut helmet (Black)
data.5a154d5cfcdbcb001a3b00da Description: The Ops-Core FAST ballistic helmet is popular in special forces all around the world. Can be modified with different components. Black version.
data.5a16b672fcdbcb001912fa83 Description: The FAST visor, designed to protect the eyes and part of the user's face from shell fragments, mines, grenades, drops of chemically aggressive liquids and oils, coarsely dispersed aerosols, thermal factors, atmospheric influences and mechanical damages in all types of combat operations.
data.5a16b7e1fcdbcb00165aa6c9 Name: Ops-Core FAST multi-hit ballistic face shield
data.5a16b7e1fcdbcb00165aa6c9 Description: A special high-strength ballistic visor for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, used by the special forces assault teams.
data.5a16b8a9fcdbcb00165aa6ca Description: A lightweight titanium mount for installation on the Shroud connector on the helmet. It is necessary for further installation of the night vision goggles or other optical devices. Manufactured by Norotos Inc.
data.5a16b93dfcdbcbcae6687261 Description: The Dual Dovetail Interface Arm mount for the AN/PVS-14 night vision monocular device.
data.5a16b9fffcdbcb0176308b34 Name: Ops-Core FAST RAC ヘッドセット
data.5a16b9fffcdbcb0176308b34 Description: A component for the Ops-Core FAST helmet - a system of noise reduction and amplification of quiet sounds, as well as a radio headset when connected to the communication device.
data.5a16ba61fcdbcb098008728a Description: An additional armor module for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, mounted on the Side Armor component.
data.5a16badafcdbcb001865f72d Description: An additional armor module for the Ops-Core FAST helmet, protects the ears from shrapnel and small caliber ricochets.
data.5a16bb52fcdbcb001a3b00dc Name: Wilcox Skull Lock ヘッドマウント
data.5a16bb52fcdbcb001a3b00dc Description: Scull Lock ヘッドマウント-Liteは、ナイトビジョンや他の光学装置を固定する軽量で薄型の装備だ。すべて布で作られており快適で汎用性も高い。これを使えば、重い防弾ヘルメットを使うことなく様々なアタッチメントを使用することができる。
data.5a17f98cfcdbcb0980087290 Description: The APS (Avtomatícheskiy Pistolét Stéchkina - "Stechkin Automatic Pistol", GAU Index - 56-A-126) is a Soviet machine pistol chambered in 9x18 PM, developed in the late 1940 by Igor Stechkin. APS is intended for arming officers who are directly involved in combat operations, as well as for soldiers and sergeants of some special units.
data.5a17fb03fcdbcbcae668728f Description: A standard 20-round magazine for Molot-produced APS pistols. It features a side observation slot for faster capacity checking.
data.5a17fb9dfcdbcbcae6687291 Name: APB 着脱式ワイヤーストック
data.5a17fb9dfcdbcbcae6687291 Description: A standard-issue wire stock for APB pistols.
data.5a17fc70fcdbcb0176308b3d Name: APS ベークライト サイドピース
data.5a17fc70fcdbcb0176308b3d Description: Standard-issue APS pistol bakelite side grips.
data.5a1eaa87fcdbcb001865f75e Description: A versatile thermal imaging telescope/sight. It can be installed on weapons for use in the form of a riflesight, on a helmet - via adapter - as a monocular, and as a separate observation device.
data.5a1eacb3fcdbcb09800872be Description: A rubber eyecup for the Trijicon REAP-IR thermal scope.
data.5a1ead28fcdbcb001912fa9f Description: The UNV DLOC-IRD universal quick release mount for installing various scopes.
data.5a269f97c4a282000b151807 Description: A 9x21mm Gyurza PS gzh (SP10, GRAU Index - 7N29) cartridge with a 6.7 gram armor-piercing bullet with a heat-strengthened steel core and a two-layer semi-jacket, a polyethylene interior and a bimetallic exterior, in a bimetallic case. This cartridge was designed in the 1990s by TsNIITochMash to provide superior penetration capabilities compared to its standard 9x19mm counterparts, being capable of piercing basic ballistic body protection equipment and some intermediate models, however, due to its design, it has a high probability of bouncing off various surfaces.
data.5a26abfac4a28232980eabff Description: A 9x21mm Gyurza P gzh (SP11, GRAU Index - 7N28) cartridge with a 7.5 gram soft lead core bullet with a bimetallic jacket in a bimetallic case. This cartridge was designed by TsNIITochMash due to the need to create a cheaper 9x21mm PS gzh "SP10" cartridge for practice shooting during experimentation with weapons of the same caliber. Because of this, the cartridge had to meet similar criteria, such as recoil, muzzle velocity, and trajectories. The result was so satisfactory that it was adopted by the FSB due to its considerable stopping power effect.
data.5a26ac06c4a282000c5a90a8 Description: A 9x21mm Gyurza PE gzh (SP12) cartridge with a 5.7 gram expansive bullet with a bimetallic semi-jacketed lead core and a ballistic polyethylene tip, in a bimetallic case. This cartridge was developed by TsNIITochMash due to the needs of the FSB to equip its special forces with a cartridge capable of granting outstanding stopping power effects at distances up to 200 meters and maintaining similar criteria to its counterparts of the same caliber, such as recoil, muzzle velocity, and trajectories.
data.5a26ac0ec4a28200741e1e18 Description: A 9x21mm Gyurza BT gzh (SP13, GRAU Index - 7BT3) cartridge with a 7.3 gram armor-piercing tracer bullet with a steel core and a two-layer semi-jacket, a lead interior and a bimetallic exterior, in a bimetallic case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Red). This BT bullet (Bronebóynaya Trassíruyushchaya - "Armor-piercing Tracer") was developed for 9x21mm caliber submachine guns by TsNIITochMash based on the 9x21mm PS gzh "SP10" cartridge and has superior characteristics, being able of piercing basic and intermediate ballistic body protections, as well as having a considerable stopping power effect, however, it has a high bounce probability on various surfaces.
data.5a27b281c4a28200741e1e52 Description: A mount for SR-1MP, included in the pistol kit, designed to form a single rail and silencer installation place.
data.5a27b3d0c4a282000d721ec1 Description: A mount for SR-1MP from the pistol kit, used for quick installation and removal of the sound suppressor.
data.5a27b6bec4a282000e496f78 Description: A standard-issue sound suppressor from the SR-1MP pistol kit. Requires a rail mount to be installed on the weapon.
data.5a27bad7c4a282000b15184b Description: A mount for the SR-1MP pistol that forms four guide rails, allowing installation of the sound suppressor.
data.5a29276886f77435ed1b117c Name: 動作するハードディスクドライブ
data.5a29276886f77435ed1b117c Description: ランダムアクセス ストレージデバイス（情報記憶装置）。磁気記録法式で、大半のコンピュータのメインデータドライブとして使われている。
data.5a29284f86f77463ef3db363 Name: Toughbook 耐衝撃ノートパソコン
data.5a29284f86f77463ef3db363 Description: 特殊な防護ケースに入れられたノートパソコン。装置が破損する危険に晒される状況下で、軍や民間企業によって使用されている。
data.5a29357286f77409c705e025 Name: スライド式USBフラッシュメモリ
data.5a29357286f77409c705e025 Description: The Sliderkey secure flash drive. Such USB sticks are frequently used by TerraGroup employees. This ones seems to have been used by the Health Resort workers.
data.5a294d7c86f7740651337cf9 Description: 補強ケースに入ったSAS ハードディスクドライブ。軍事産業でのデータストレージとして使われている。
data.5a294d8486f774068638cd93 Description: 補強ケースに入ったSAS ハードディスクドライブ。軍事産業でのデータストレージとして使われている。
data.5a2a57cfc4a2826c6e06d44a Description: A Soviet-made smoke hand grenade, designed to create smoke zones with covering or target designation purposes. Cheap and pretty common in post-soviet countries.
data.5a329052c4a28200741e22d3 Description: A standard handguard manufactured by JP Enterprises for the Remington R11 RSASS marksman rifle. Can also be mounted on any AR-10/AR-15 base receivers.
data.5a32a064c4a28200741e22de Name: SilencerCo Osprey 9 9x19mm サウンドサプレッサー
data.5a32a064c4a28200741e22de Description: A light sound suppressor for 9x19 pistols and SMGs, manufactured by SilencerCo.
data.5a32aa0cc4a28232996e405f Description: A universal base for installation of the Trijicon RMR series reflex sights, replaces the standard rear sight of the SIG Sauer pistols.
data.5a32aa8bc4a2826c6e06d737 Description: RMR (Ruggedized Miniature Reflex) is a durable and lightweight compact reflex sight. Can be used as a main or backup sight. Requires a specific mount for installation on Weaver rails. Manufactured by Trijicon.
data.5a339805c4a2826c6e06d73d Description: The Magpul MIAD (Mission Adaptable) polymer pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.5a33a8ebc4a282000c5a950d Name: Alpha Dog Alpha 9 9x19 サウンドサプレッサー
data.5a33a8ebc4a282000c5a950d Description: A pistol sound suppressor with a Weaver rail made for mounting an alternative sight. Manufactured by Alpha Dog.
data.5a33b2c9c4a282000c5a9511 Description: A low-profile mount for installation of the Trijicon RMR series reflex sights on Picatinny and Weaver rails.
data.5a33b652c4a28232996e407c Description: A high-profile mount for installation of the Trijicon RMR series reflex sights on Picatinny and Weaver rails.
data.5a33bab6c4a28200741e22f8 Name: ACOGスコープ用 Trijicon RMRマウント
data.5a33bab6c4a28200741e22f8 Description: A universal mount on a place of a backup sight to allow the mounting of the Trijicon RMR reflex sight on the ACOG scopes.
data.5a33ca0fc4a282000d72292f Description: Colt製レシーバーエクステンション。4ポジションのミルスペック径バッファーチューブで、AR-15系のカービンやライフルに装着が可能だ。
data.5a33cae9c4a28232980eb086 Description: The PRS GEN2 stock manufactured by Magpul. Flat Dark Earth version.
data.5a33e75ac4a2826c6e06d759 Name: AR-15 Hera Arms CQR pistol grip/buttstock
data.5a33e75ac4a2826c6e06d759 Description: Designed for the cilvilian market as well as for military use, to create one of the most rigid and compact Rifle Systems based on the widely available AR-15 platform. The CQR Riflestock is an easy to install replacement buttstock for Mil-Spec AR-15 Rifles using a Mil-Spec Carbine buffer tube.
data.5a34f7f1c4a2826c6e06d75d Description: An 18 inch (457mm) barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo.
data.5a34fae7c4a2826c6e06d760 Description: A 22 inch (558mm) barrel for AR-10 based weapons for 7.62x51 NATO ammo.
data.5a34fbadc4a28200741e230a Description: Installed as a standard AR-10/AR-15-based weapons gas block, adding a Picatinny rail that allows installing alternative accessory front sights.
data.5a34fd2bc4a282329a73b4c5 Description: The Advanced Armament Corporation (AAC) Blackout 51T flash hider is an effective flash suppressor that also serves as an attachment platform for the AAC 762-SDN-6 sound suppressor. Can be installed on AR-10-based rifles.
data.5a34fe59c4a282000b1521a2 Description: The AAC 762-SDN-6 sound suppressor is designed for use with 7.62x51 NATO ammo, but also functions as a superb multi-caliber suppressor for multiple hosts, providing excellent performance on 7.62 NATO, .300 AAC, 6.8 SPC, 6.5, and 5.56mm NATO. Can only be installed on compatible with "51T" devices.
data.5a3501acc4a282000d72293a Name: AR-10 7.62x51 Magpul PMAG 20 SR-LR GEN M3 20-round magazine
data.5a3501acc4a282000d72293a Description: A 20-round double-stack Magpul PMAG SR/LR GEN M3 20 magazine for 7.62x51 NATO ammunition.
data.5a351711c4a282000b1521a4 Name: HK MP5 9x19 X Products X-5 50-round drum magazine
data.5a351711c4a282000b1521a4 Description: A 50-round 9x19 drum magazine for the MP5 submachine gun. Manufactured by X Products.
data.5a367e5dc4a282000e49738f Description: Remington Semi Automatic Sniper System - RSASSは、高精度かつ速射可能なスナイパーライフルを開発しようというRemington ArmsとJP Enterprisesの共同開発の集大成である。セミオートマチックライフルとしての戦術的優位性を持ちつつ、800 m以上に及ぶsub-MOA（着弾範囲が1 MOA以内）の精度を誇る。
data.5a37ca54c4a282000d72296a Name: JP Enterprises Flat-Top 30mm ring scope mount
data.5a37ca54c4a282000d72296a Description: A universal 30mm scope base mount for installation on Picatinny rails. Manufactured by JP Enterprises.
data.5a37cb10c4a282329a73b4e7 Name: Leupold Mark 4 LR 6.5-20x50 ライフルスコープ
data.5a37cb10c4a282329a73b4e7 Description: Precise, accurate, durable and dependable - the Leupold Mark 4 6.5-20x50 rifle scope. The model provides 6.5 - 20x magnification giving you a clear idea of the actual size of the targeted object.
data.5a38e6bac4a2826c6e06d79b Name: TOZ-106 20ga ボルトアクション ショットガン
data.5a38e6bac4a2826c6e06d79b Description: 単銃身で20ゲージの散弾を使用するボルトアクション方式の狩猟用散弾銃。違法に銃身を切り詰めて銃床も短くしたソビエト連邦の散弾銃は、コルホーズのような歴史的な背景もあって "Смерть председателя" (スニャルチ プレチダーチリャ / 議長の死) という通称で呼ばれたが、この TOZ-106 もコンパクトなサイズからその名で広く知られている。
data.5a38ebd9c4a282000d722a5b Description: A 20/70 gauge shell loaded with 7.5mm buckshot.
data.5a38ed75c4a28232996e40c6 Description: A 4-shot 20ga magazine for the MTs 20-01 and TOZ-106 hunting shotguns.
data.5a38ee51c4a282000c5a955c Description: A 2-shot 20 gauge magazine for MTs 20-01 and TOZ-106 hunting shotguns.
data.5a38eecdc4a282329a73b512 Description: The TOZ 002 pistol grip for the TOZ-106 bolt-action shotgun.
data.5a38ef1fc4a282000b1521f6 Description: TOZ-106用の標準ショルダーピース付き折り畳み式ストック。
data.5a398ab9c4a282000c5a9842 Name: Ops Core Single Clamp レイルアダプターマウント
data.5a398ab9c4a282000c5a9842 Description: A mount for installing flashlight devices on Ops-Core helmets.

data.5a3c16fe86f77452b62de32a Description: A 9x19mm Luger cartridge with a special heavy bullet; marked with a blue tip, manufactured by CCI. Despite the heavy bullet on this cartridge, it still has an average muzzle velocity relative to other cartridges of the same caliber, endowing it with a considerable stopping power effect, along with causing severe adverse effects on the target after impact at the cost of penetration capabilities.
data.5a43943586f77416ad2f06e2 Name: ジェドマロースの帽子
data.5a43943586f77416ad2f06e2 Description: A headpiece of the famous Ded Moroz ("Grandfather Frost"). A traditional Russian hat, if you want to get hammered hardcore style in the New Year's Eve.
data.5a43957686f7742a2c2f11b0 Description: Santa's hat. Often gets confused with the Ded Moroz hat. Ded Moroz is cooler, by the way. Really, guys, really. Just listen - "Grandfather Frost". The one and only! Anyway, thank you all, and happy New Year!
data.5a5f1ce64f39f90b401987bc Name: Zenit 2IRS Klesch フラッシュライト + レーザーサイト
data.5a5f1ce64f39f90b401987bc Description: The Klesch-2IKS underbarrel-mounted IR illuminator with an IR laser aiming module, designed to be used with night vision devices. This specific model does not feature non-IR functionality. Manufactured by Zenit.
data.5a6086ea4f39f99cd479502f Description: A 7.62x51mm NATO M61 cartridge with a 9.8 gram armor-piercing bullet with a hardened steel core with lead cladding on the tip and a bimetallic jacket, in a brass case. This cartridge was designed in the 1950s based on the .30-06 Springfield AP M2 cartridge to provide the United States Armed Forces with an armor-piercing bullet for 7.62x51mm NATO caliber automatic weaponry, being able to pierce through the most modern specialized ballistic body protections, in addition to provide a significant stopping power effect. However, it has a significant bounce probability on various surfaces.
data.5a608bf24f39f98ffc77720e Description: A 7.62x51mm NATO M62 cartridge with a 9.2 gram lead-antimony alloy core tracer bullet with a bimetallic jacket, in a brass case; intended for target designation and fire adjustment in battle (Trace color: Green). This cartridge was designed to provide tracing capabilities to the 7.62x51mm NATO caliber automatic weaponry used by the United States Armed Forces, being able to pierce through basic and intermediate body ballistic protections, in addition to provide a considerable stopping power effect. However, it has a high bounce probability on various surfaces.
data.5a6860d886f77411cd3a9e47 Description: A special protected folder for storing important documents. Almost impossible to break open or destroy. It has the number 0060 and a strange symbol on it.

data.5a7c4850e899ef00150be885 Description: 6B47 is an aramid helmet of Russian origin. As part of the Ratnik program, it is the new standard-issue helmet for most of the Russian Armed Forces. It has equal protection but weighs slightly less, floats in water, and has mounting equipment for lights and night vision devices. The helmet can be fitted with a variety of covers for different environments.

data.5aa7cfc0e5b5b00015693143 Description: 6B47 is an aramid helmet of Russian origin. As part of the Ratnik program, it is the new standard-issue helmet for most of the Russian Armed Forces. The 6B47 is similar to previous generation helmets such as the 6B7-1M and 6B27. It has equal protection but weighs slightly less, floats in water, and has mounting equipment for lights and night vision devices. The helmet can be fitted with a variety of covers for different environments. Equipped with a Digital Flora camouflage cover.

data.5aafa857e5b5b00018480968 Description: M1A is a civilian version of the M14 rifle designed and manufactured by Springfield Armory, Inc. For the most part, it is identical to the M14. The most notable difference is the removal of the M14's fire selector switch, rendering the rifle permanently semi-automatic. The bayonet lug was also removed from the weapon.
data.5aafbcd986f7745e590fff23 Description: 医薬品を保管するためのケース。
data.5aafbde786f774389d0cbc0f Description: Kiba Arms International の樹脂製のアンモボックス。
data.5ab24ef9e5b5b00fe93c9209 Description: The upper part of the SOCOM 16 stock for M1A rifles. It has a Weaver rail for attaching various scopes and reflex sights.
data.5ab372a310e891001717f0d8 Description: The TROY Semi-Automatic Sniper System chassis is designed to match the ergonomics of M16/M4 weapon systems. This modular quad-rail system allows unlimited mounting options and keeps all optics and sights mounted and undisturbed while field stripping.
data.5ab3afb2d8ce87001660304d Name: M1A Smith Enterprise SOCOM 16 7.62x51 threaded muzzle brake & gas block
data.5ab3afb2d8ce87001660304d Description: A muzzle brake/gas block for M1A rifles, manufactured by Smith Enterprise.
data.5ab626e4d8ce87272e4c6e43 Description: A metal skeleton stock for AKS-74 automatic rifles, manufactured by IzhMash.
data.5ab8dab586f77441cd04f2a2 Description: This chest rig platform is designed for placing equipment in the chest and abdomen areas, with an open back. Includes integrated pouches, designed for 8 magazines. Can be used both separately and on top of the armor vest. Manufactured by WARTECH.
data.5ab8dced86f774646209ec87 Name: ANA Tactical M2 アーマーリグ
data.5ab8dced86f774646209ec87 Description: A tactical rig with additional class 4 (Russian GOST) armor plates. The vest is created with the use of the best experience of Russian special forces operators. The versatility of the system makes it possible to use this vest both when carrying out city tasks and when performing tasks on rough terrain. Equipped with additional pouches for 8 magazines. Manufactured by ANA Tactical.
data.5ab8e4ed86f7742d8e50c7fa Description: A class III body armor used by UN soldiers during the UNTAR mission in Tarkov.
data.5ab8e79e86f7742d8b372e78 Name: BNTI Gzhel-K ボディアーマー
data.5ab8e79e86f7742d8b372e78 Description: Gzhel アサルト防弾ベストは、ロシアの国内軍や法執行機関に所属する特殊部隊向けに設計された。その中でも Gzhel-K "グジェリ - カ" と呼ばれる特殊派生型は、コランダムという非常に硬い酸化アルミニウムの結晶をベースとしたセラミック製防弾プレートを装備しており、GOST規格でクラス4の防弾性能を有している。
data.5ab8e9fcd8ce870019439434 Name: AKS-74N 5.45x39 アサルトライフル
data.5ab8e9fcd8ce870019439434 Description: AKS-74N (Avtomat Kalashnikova Skladnoy 74 Nochnoy - "Kalashnikov's Automatic rifle 74 Night with foldable stock") 5.45x39mm assault rifle equipped with a side-folding metal shoulder stock, designed primarily for use with air assault infantry. The key design difference from the standard AKS-74 is a side dovetail mount for optical and night scopes.
data.5ab8ebf186f7742d8b372e80 Name: SSO "Attack-2" レイドバックパック
data.5ab8ebf186f7742d8b372e80 Description: The 60-liter "Attack 2" raid backpack is intended for carrying personal belongings and equipment through tough field conditions.
data.5ab8ee7786f7742d8f33f0b9 Description: 全天候基本装備キット（VKBO）に含まれているバックパック。個人装備の輸送及び保管用に設計されている。
data.5ab8f04f86f774585f4237d8 Name: タクティカルスリングバッグ
data.5ab8f04f86f774585f4237d8 Description: 通勤やお出かけにピッタリで毎日使えるバッグ。
data.5ab8f20c86f7745cdb629fb2 Description: Wow, man! This is where the style is. As well as warmth and comfort.
data.5ab8f39486f7745cd93a1cca Name: Cold Fear Infrared バラクラバ
data.5ab8f39486f7745cd93a1cca Description: A quality balaclava with a special technological material, which ensures maximum warmth in the most severe frosts. But we do not need it for warmth. We need it to look tactical.
data.5ab8f4ff86f77431c60d91ba Name: ゴースト バラクラバ
data.5ab8f4ff86f77431c60d91ba Description: A tactical balaclava with a skull print. "Bloody yanks! I thought they were the good guys!"
data.5ab8f85d86f7745cd93a1cf5 Description: 世界中のPMCに人気のかぶり物。
data.5aba62f8d8ce87001943946b Description: A standard front sight for APS pistols.
data.5aba637ad8ce87001773e17f Description: A standard rear sight for APS pistols.
data.5aba639ed8ce8700182ece67 Description: A standard rear sight for APB pistols.
data.5abcbb20d8ce87001773e258 Name: M14 SA Enlarged Military Aperture rear sight
data.5abcbb20d8ce87001773e258 Description: The Enlarged Military Aperture rear sight for M14 rifles manufactured by Springfield Armory.
data.5abcbc27d8ce8700182eceeb Name: AKMSN 7.62x39 アサルトライフル
data.5abcbc27d8ce8700182eceeb Description: AKMSN 7.62x39 (Avtomát Kaláshnikova Modernizírovanny Skladnóy Nochnóy - "Kalashnikov's Automatic rifle Modernised Night with a foldable stock") is a modified AKMS automatic rifle with a dovetail mount for installation of the NSP family night vision scopes — NSP-2/3/3A, NSPU, NSPU-M.
data.5abcc328d8ce8700194394f3 Description: A standard-issue detachable APB pistol sound suppressor.
data.5abccb7dd8ce87001773e277 Description: The APB pistol (Avtomatícheskiy Pistolét Besshúmnyy - "Silenced Automatic Pistol", GRAU Index - 6P13) is a silenced version of the Stechkin machine pistol, widely used by different Russian special forces.
data.5abcd472d8ce8700166032ae Description: A folding shoulder piece assembly for AKMSN automatic rifles, manufactured by Izhmash.
data.5ac4c50d5acfc40019262e87 Description: A weak protection from eye and face damage, made to mount on Kolpak-1S helmet.
data.5ac4cd105acfc40016339859 Name: AK-74M 5.45x39 アサルトライフル
data.5ac4cd105acfc40016339859 Description: The AK-74M (Avtomat Kalashnikova 74 Modernizirovanny - "Kalashnikov's Automatic rifle 74 Modernized") 5.45x39mm assault rifle is a full-scale produced modernized version of the AK-74 that offers more versatility compared with its predecessor. Apart from several minor improvements, such as a lightened bolt and carrier assembly to reduce the impulse of the gas piston and bolt carrier during firing, the rifle features a new glass-filled polyamide stock that retains the shape of the original AK-74 fixed laminated wood stock, but side-folds to the left like the skeletonised AKS-74 buttstock, and also a dovetail side mount for installing various scopes. The AK-74M is a main service rifle of the Russian Federation.
data.5ac50c185acfc400163398d4 Description: A polymer stock for AK-74M automatic rifles, manufactured by Izhmash.
data.5ac50da15acfc4001718d287 Description: A standard-issue dust cover for AK-74M automatic rifles, manufactued by Izhmash.
data.5ac620eb86f7743a8e6e0da0 Description: A package sealed with a large amount of tape. It's quite battered, but the contents appear to be intact.
data.5ac66bea5acfc43b321d4aec Description: A 30-round bakelite Izhmash magazine for 7.62x39 ammo, for AK-103 and compatible systems. Can also be supplied with .366 TKM ammo for use with the corresponding caliber AK-compatible weapons.
data.5ac66c5d5acfc4001718d314 Description: A 30-round 5.56x45 Izhmash 6L29 polymer magazine for AK-101 and compatible systems.
data.5ac66cb05acfc40198510a10 Name: AK-101 5.56x45 アサルトライフル
data.5ac66cb05acfc40198510a10 Description: The AK-101 5.56x45mm assault rifle is a further modernized version of AK-74M base. AK-101 is equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. The rifle is chambered to fire 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition, and is designed entirely for export purposes. The 100-series AKs are produced by the Izhmash factories in Izhevsk, Russia.
data.5ac66d015acfc400180ae6e4 Name: AK-102 5.56x45 アサルトライフル
data.5ac66d015acfc400180ae6e4 Description: The AK-102 5.56x45mm assault rifle is a further modernized version of AK-74M base, more precisely a shortened version of AK-101. A short compact version equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. The AK-102 is chambered to fire 5.56x45mm NATO ammunition, and is designed entirely for export purposes. The 100-series AKs are produced by the Izhmash factories in Izhevsk, Russia.
data.5ac66d2e5acfc43b321d4b53 Name: AK-103 7.62x39 アサルトライフル
data.5ac66d2e5acfc43b321d4b53 Description: The AK-103 7.62x39mm assault rifle is a further modernized version of AK-74M base. AK-103 is equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. The 100-series AKs are produced by the Izhmash factories in Izhevsk, Russia.
data.5ac66d725acfc43b321d4b60 Name: AK-104 7.62x39 アサルトライフル
data.5ac66d725acfc43b321d4b60 Description: The AK-104 7.62x39mm assault rifle is a further modernized version of AK-74M base, more precisely a shortened version of AK-103. A short compact version equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. The 100-series AKs are produced by the Izhmash factories in Izhevsk, Russia.

data.5ac66d9b5acfc4001633997a Description: The AK-105 5.45x39mm assault rifle is a further modernized version of AK-74M base. A short compact version equipped with a side-folding shoulder stock and a side mount for optical and night scopes. The 100-series AKs are produced by the Izhmash factories in Izhevsk, Russia.

data.5addbba15acfc400185c2854 Description: A muzzle brake-compensator for M14 rifles, manufactured by Smith Enterprise.

data.5addbbb25acfc40015621bd9 Description: A muzzle brake-compensator manufactured by Yankee Hill to fit M14 rifles.
data.5addbf175acfc408fb13965b Description: The Archangel polymer chassis for M1A rifles, manufactured by ProMag.
data.5addbfbb5acfc400194dbcf7 Name: M14 UltiMAK M8 Forward Optic mount
data.5addbfbb5acfc400194dbcf7 Description: The M8 optic mount manufactured by UltiMAK. Lightweight, fully machined 1913 Picatinny-style rail accepts intermediate eye relief scopes, red dot, holographic, and reflex optics. Installs in place of the factory handguard.
data.5addbfd15acfc40015621bde Name: M14 Amega Mini Scout Mount system
data.5addbfd15acfc40015621bde Description: The Mini Scout Mount base for M14 rifles, manufactured by Amega Mounts. Features a top Picatinny rail for mounting various scopes and reflex sights.
data.5addbfe15acfc4001a5fc58b Description: The A.R.M.S. Inc. scope mount for M14 rifles. Made of 8620 case hardened steel. Equipped with a Weaver rail for installation of various scopes.
data.5addbfef5acfc400185c2857 Name: M14 Leapers UTG 4-Point Locking Deluxe mount
data.5addbfef5acfc400185c2857 Description: The 4-Point Locking Deluxe mount for M14 rifles, manufactured by Leapers Inc. It has Weaver/Picatinny type rails for mounting various scopes and reflex sights.
data.5addbffe5acfc4001714dfac Description: The M14 DCSB (Detachable Cantilevered Sight Base) mount for M14 rifles, manufactured by SAGE International. It has a Weaver-type rail for mounting various different sights. Can only be installed on the EBR chassis.
data.5addc00b5acfc4001669f144 Description: The CASV-14 Rail System mount manufactured by Vltor. It has a Picatinny-type rail for mounting various optical attachments and accesories, and also a KeyMod mount points on both sides.
data.5addc7005acfc4001669f275 Description: The M14ALCS chassis for M14 rifles from the Enhanced Battle Rifle (EBR) kit. Manufactured by SAGE International.
data.5addc7ac5acfc400194dbd90 Description: The M14ALCS (MOD-0) stock for M14 rifles from the Enhanced Battle Rifle (EBR) kit, manufactured by SAGE International.
data.5addc7db5acfc4001669f279 Name: M14 SAGE International M14ALCS (MOD-0) pistol grip
data.5addc7db5acfc4001669f279 Description: The M14ALCS (MOD-0) pistol grip for M14 rifles from the Enhanced Battle Rifle (EBR) kit, manufactured by SAGE International.
data.5addcce35acfc4001a5fc635 Description: A 30-round double-stack 7.62x51 NATO magazine for the M1 rifle. Produced by Triple K.
data.5addccf45acfc400185c2989 Name: M14 7.62x51 X Products X-14 50-round drum magazine
data.5addccf45acfc400185c2989 Description: A 50 round 7.62x51 drum NATO magazine for the M14 rifle. Manufactured by X Products.
data.5adf23995acfc400185c2aeb Description: A standard stock for MTs 20-01 hunting rifles, but can be also installed on various different shotguns including the bolt-action TOZ-106.
data.5ae08f0a5acfc408fb1398a1 Description: Mosin-Nagant M91/30 PUは有名なロシア製ライフルの狙撃仕様だ。第二次世界大戦では多くのソ連軍狙撃兵が使用した。
data.5ae096d95acfc400185c2c81 Description: Mosin-Nagantスナイパーライフル用の標準木製ライフルストック。
data.5ae0973a5acfc4001562206c Description: A standard 7.62x54R 5-round magazine designed for the Mosin rifle. The magazine is installed into the rifle internally and cannot be ejected on the spot, so it's not recommended to take multiple of them into a raid.
data.5ae099875acfc4001714e593 Description: A standard-issue front sight for the Mosin rifle.
data.5ae099925acfc4001a5fc7b3 Description: A standard rear sight for the Mosin rifle.
data.5ae09bff5acfc4001562219d Description: Mosin-Nagantライフル用の標準730mmバレル。
data.5ae30bad5acfc400185c2dc4 Description: A detachable carry handle with a rear sight for AR-15 rifles. Standard-issue for M4A1 assault rifles.
data.5ae30c9a5acfc408fb139a03 Description: A telescoping stock manufactured by LMT Defense. Part of SOPMOD Block 0.

data.5ae30db85acfc408fb139a05 Description: A carbine length handguard manufactured by Colt, a standard-issue handguard for the M4A1 assault rifles.
data.5ae30e795acfc408fb139a0b Description: A standard-issue front sight for the M4A1 assault rifles, manufactured by Colt.

data.5ae35b315acfc4001714e8b0 Description: Mesa Tactical の伸縮ストックコンバージョンキットは標準バットストックを置き換えて、AR系の伸縮ストックとピストルグリップを装着可能にするアダプターだ。

data.5ae9a18586f7746e381e16a3 Description: OLI cargo manifests, partially torn up, but the shipment information can still be read.

data.5ae9a3f586f7740aab00e4e6 Description: 洋服のデザインと様々な素材による製造技術が記された本の第1巻。
data.5ae9a4fc86f7746e381e1753 Description: 洋服のデザインと様々な素材による製造技術が記された本の第2巻。
data.5af0454c86f7746bf20992e8 Description: 骨折や脱臼をした患部に添えて固定するためのアルミ二ウム製の副子。
data.5af0484c86f7740f02001f7f Name: マジャイカ コーヒー豆
data.5af0484c86f7740f02001f7f Description: "マジャイカ" ブランドのアラビカ種100%コーヒー。風味を損なわずに長期間保存できる。
data.5af04b6486f774195a3ebb49 Description: ワイヤーを掴んだり、動かしたり、切断するための高品質なペンチ。
data.5af04c0b86f774138708f78e Description: モーターコントローラーは固定武器や主力戦車での使用目的に開発された。システムの電源、入出力、性能、構成は激しい動きの中でも高い精度の射撃ができるよう高い要求水準を満たしており、まだ同時に簡単に調整ができるように設計されている。モーターコントローラーはEMIフィルタリング、電源回路、組み込みシステムソフトウェア、制御アルゴリズム、共通サービスツール、接続用のインターフェイスなどからなる。
data.5af04e0a86f7743a532b79e2 Description:
単軸及び双軸光ファイバジャイロスコープ（Fiber Optic Gyroscopes:FOG）は高機能な軍事用途の最高位品として開発された。FOGは補正されたヨー軸（左右回転方向:Z軸）をインテリジェントセンサーの同期バス（Integrated Bus for Intelligent Sensors:IBIS）、又は非同期のRS-422インターフェイスへ提供する。

特に過酷な環境で使用するために開発されたこのジャイロスコープは、MIL-STD-810地上でのモバイル使用に応じた極端な衝撃および振動に耐えることができ、完全にデジタル化され、オンラインBITを含み、可動部品はない。
data.5af0534a86f7743b6f354284 Description: 網膜や視神経など、眼の内部を検査するための医療機器。
data.5af0548586f7743a532b7e99 Description: イブプロフェンは、非ステロイド性抗炎症薬 (NSAIDs) の一種で、痛みや炎症、発熱を抑える鎮痛剤だ。
data.5af0561e86f7745f5f3ad6ac Description: 持ち運びできる充電式の大容量モバイルバッテリー。

data.5b04473a5acfc40018632f70 Description: The UAS stock for AKM/AK74-type non-folding assault rifles. Manufactured by FAB Defense.
data.5b057b4f5acfc4771e1bd3e9 Description: The Stark SE-5 Express Forward tactical grip enables a more natural grip against the barrel axis. Thanks to that, it reduces recoil and improves the weapon control.

data.5b07db875acfc40dc528a5f6 Description: A lightweight skeletonized pistol grip for AR-15 weapon systems and compatibles, manufactured by Tactical Dynamics.

data.5b0800175acfc400153aebd4 Description: The F93 PRO telescoping stock, manufactured by ERGO.

data.5b0bbe4e5acfc40dc528a72d Description: The SA-58 OSW (Operations Specialist Weapon), manufactured by American company DSA (or DS Arms - David Selvaggio Arms), is a legal copy of the FAL. It's made with the same Steyr-Daimler-Puch production line equipment as the StG-58. It may come with a different barrel length, an aluminum-alloy lower receiver, and improved glass-filled nylon furniture. Civilian models are semi-automatic, but military and law enforcement clients can procure select-fire models that have a fully automatic cyclic rate of 750 rounds/minute. The DSA-58 can use any metric-measurement FAL magazines.

data.5b1fa9b25acfc40018633c01 Description: Glock 18はGlock 17にフルオート機能を追加したモデルだ。33発の弾が入る拡張マガジンと共に使用されることが多いが、Glock 17用の10/17/19発マガジンも使用できる。Glock 18のスライドは通常の長さだが、ロングスライドモデルと同様にスライド前端に穴が開いている。バレルにもマズル先端に向かうにつれ大きくなる4つの切り欠きが入っており、スライドの穴を通して発射ガスが上に逃げることで反動の制御がしやすくなっている。

data.5b3b713c5acfc4330140bd8d Description: A legendary pistol that has seen numerous military conflicts throughout the years and is still in service in certain regions of the world, in one variation or another. This one is a classic TT-33, the most mass-produced version. It features a Browning short-recoil tilting-barrel system, but other than that, the construction design is very unique - it is purposefully simple, single-action, and no safety measures except half-cock notch, which makes it be able to withstand horrible operating abuse. Thanks to the powerful 7.62x25 cartridge and relatively long barrel, the TT boasts high muzzle velocity, penetration, and impressive accuracy, even over long distances. A special gold edition.

data.5b44cd8b86f774503d30cba2 Name: IOTV Gen4 body armor (Full Protection Kit)
data.5b44cd8b86f774503d30cba2 Description: Improved Outer Tactical Vest（IOTV - 改良型タクティカルボディアーマー）の第4世代Gen IVは、体を自由に動かせるように設計されており射撃姿勢をとる際にも妨げとならない。最適化されたデザインにより装備の重量を最適に分散することができ、着心地と耐久性と機動性が向上している。これは全身を保護するバージョンだ。
data.5b44cf1486f77431723e3d05 Description: Improved Outer Tactical Vest（IOTV - 改良型タクティカルボディアーマー）の第4世代Gen IVは、体を自由に動かせるように設計されており射撃姿勢をとる際にも妨げとならない。最適化されたデザインにより装備の重量を最適に分散することができ、着心地と耐久性と機動性が向上している。これはエルゴノミクスが向上したアサルトバージョンだ。

data.5b44d0de86f774503d30cba8 Description: Improved Outer Tactical Vest（IOTV - 改良型タクティカルボディアーマー）の第4世代Gen IVは、体を自由に動かせるように設計されており射撃姿勢をとる際にも妨げとならない。最適化されたデザインにより装備の重量を最適に分散することができ、着心地と耐久性と機動性が向上している。これは機動性と快適性が向上したバージョンだ。

data.5b4c72b386f7745b453af9c0 Description: モーターコントローラーは固定武器や主力戦車での使用目的に開発された。システムの電源、入出力、性能、構成は激しい動きの中でも高い精度の射撃ができるよう高い要求水準を満たしており、まだ同時に簡単に調整ができるように設計されている。モーターコントローラーはEMIフィルタリング、電源回路、組み込みシステムソフトウェア、制御アルゴリズム、共通サービスツール、接続用のインターフェイスなどからなる。
data.5b4c72c686f77462ac37e907 Description: モーターコントローラーは固定武器や主力戦車での使用目的に開発された。システムの電源、入出力、性能、構成は激しい動きの中でも高い精度の射撃ができるよう高い要求水準を満たしており、まだ同時に簡単に調整ができるように設計されている。モーターコントローラーはEMIフィルタリング、電源回路、組み込みシステムソフトウェア、制御アルゴリズム、共通サービスツール、接続用のインターフェイスなどからなる。
data.5b4c72fb86f7745cef1cffc5 Description: Single and dual-axis Fiber Optic Gyroscopes (FOG) have been developed for high-performance military applications and are of the highest quality. The FOGs provide compensated yaw rates to the synchronous Integrated Bus for Intelligent Sensors (IBIS) or the asynchronous RS-422 interface. Developed for use in particularly harsh environments, the gyroscopes can withstand extreme shock and vibration in accordance with MIL-STD-810 ground mobile use, are fully digitized, include on-line BIT, and have no moving parts.
