The data he kept was from classified official reports. So anyway, as you know, everything did go to shit, but he couldn't manage to pass the info on. Do you have any idea what kind of juice there might be in his doodles? Search the place, find me that journal.
data.638fcd23dc65553116701d33 successMessageT: Interesting doodles, encrypted too. The guy was smart, he knew that if he was dead, no one would understand whatever the hell he wrote in there.
data.638fd070202cd55bee01ca11: Obtain the financial records on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135534b15ca31f76bc317 description: Hello, soldier! He who has the information is the victor. You want peace to win, don't you? So it's time to find some information for the good guys. A company was laundering money in the car dealership. Find any data on them that might be useful. My man managed to get a copy of the key to the office. Here you go. The problem, though, is that the entrance to the section itself is also locked, and we haven't been able to find that second key.
data.639135534b15ca31f76bc317 successMessageT: This information would be good leverage in the negotiations. It turns out that someone with the nickname Kaban, Hog in English, was operating there, but after some unknown events, he disappeared. A sincere thank you from the Blue Helmets!
data.639135534b15ca31f76bc318: Obtain the digital storage device from the car dealership manager's office on Streets of Tarkov
data.6391359b9444fb141f4e6ee6 description: Come in, come in! I've got something for you to do. It's a personal matter. I sent a letter just before all this mess started in Tarkov. And now I don't think it's worth it to stir it all up. Not the time. Would you look in the post office and see if my letter is still there?
data.6391359b9444fb141f4e6ee6 successMessageT: Did you find it? Phew, that's a load off my mind. You haven't read it, have you? Better not.
data.6391359b9444fb141f4e6ee7: Obtain the registered mail on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135a7e705511c8a4a1b78 description: Listen, brother, can you help me find proper info on a guy? He's already left the city. Why can't I find him myself? Because his fucking name is Ivan Ivanov. Seriously, I'm not kidding. There are two hundred thousand of them all over the country with that name. If we could find his former address in Tarkov, we might be able to run him through the database. Let me see what I can find on him. I think he used to run a bar, right. I don't know the name of the bar though... Listen, I don't know how you're gonna know which bar is his. Oh, that reminds me, he was into ballet. No kidding. He went to the Mariinsky every season. Even tried to host something at our local theater, but people weren't really crazy about chicks in tutus. More specific? Brother, I'm already fucking specific! I believe in you, use your intuition.
data.639135a7e705511c8a4a1b78 successMessageT: Found both the bar and the guy's address? Here, write it down for me.  You're better than those psychics on TV finding missing people. Wanna be a detective when all this is over, bro? I'll fix you up with a Poirot hat, I promise.
data.63a7da6f5199ab1f7d4a774a: Locate the balletmeister's apartment on Streets of Tarkov
data.63a7daae04d3dc28a52a2109: Survive and extract from the location
data.639135b04ed9512be67647d7 description: Hello, warrior. I have another personal matter. I have a friend in town, Oleg. He's a retired captain, such a great man! A real fighter, you and I would never reach his greatness. And what a patriot! The problem is that I haven't heard from him for a while now. I'm worried about him. Will you check on him?
data.639135b04ed9512be67647d7 successMessageT: No one's in the apartment and there's blood on the floor? Maybe the blood isn't his... And the belongings, are his things still there? Oh boy, he sure wouldn't leave the insignia behind. If you only knew how much he cared about it. So he must be gone. Let us remember him.
data.639c8c875573fd6cc27d99bb: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7db4a3e491955e65fb88b: Locate the apartment of Prapor's friend on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135bbc115f907b14700a6 description: I have another detective job for you. I have a client, a very good guy. A rocker. I used to sell their band all sorts of stuff when they were playing in our town! The guy was in Tarkov when it all started, rehearsing at someone's crib. And then the evacuation started and all that bullshit. So the guy lost his guitar pick... Yeah, man, you're gonna go looking for a plectrum. Why are you so surprised? He got that pick from either Hetfield or that hairy, what's-his-name... The hairy one, you should know! Too-doo-doo, too-doo-doo-doo-doo... Oh, man, they won't take you to Guess the Tune. Anyway, find the plectrum, it's got the AG initials on it, you won't mistake it. You have no idea how much a dude is willing to pay for that plastic shit. An address? If he could remember the address, I'd go to the address myself!
data.639135bbc115f907b14700a6 successMessageT: How the fuck did you find one tiny guitar pick in a huge city?! Better than Sherlock, I swear. All right, give me the plectrum, because the client's all pissed off right now, can't find a muse or something. Tell me, do you have any idea why this plastic thing can cost so much?
data.63a7d8f404d3dc28a52a2104: Locate the musician gathering spot on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135c3744e452011470807 description: Come here, my dear employee. Everything okay in the city? I got a few teams of mine missing. At first I thought, why the fuck would someone be so cocky, trying to shut my business down? Unless they're messing with me or something. I assumed it was that punk from the Lighthouse at first. But then I get a message from Seva Shket. He wrote that they were kept in some private prison. Have you heard about it? It's hidden somewhere in the old apartment buildings. Suits would dump their rivals there and whoever's easier to keep locked up than kept loose. I'd just kill them if that was such a problem, honestly. But it looks like someone would rather keep them in jail than just pop the cunts bothering them... Here's the deal: Shket was the only one in the group who escaped, but now he's on the run, hasn't contacted us since that message he sent. Didn't even tell us where to find the guys, this rat-faced fuck. The guys themselves are to blame for being caught like some bitches, and I would have just told them to fuck off for such a screwup. But the fact that someone's trying to fuck me over is outrageous. All right, enough of this bullshit. Find out where they keep my boys.
data.639135c3744e452011470807 successMessageT: Fucking hell. Why would someone keep them there? I'd understand if they sent me a letter saying they'd kill my people if I didn't pay up and shit. A serial killer or something? Anyway, come around in a little while, I'll find out what's going on.
data.63972c5d61b7754ff93bf3ba: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d767f32fa1316250c3da: Locate where the missing group was held captive on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135cd8ba6894d155e77cb description: I made some background checks on the guy who runs the place. The warden's condo is in the same house. That's where he was supposed to take all the loot. You know, the payment for keeping people locked up. I'd be looking for a way into the apartment straight from the jail. So go check it out again. I'm guessing the motherfucker's still in there hiding. Okay, you know what to do with him. Anything you find in the crib is all yours. Deal?
data.639135cd8ba6894d155e77cb successMessageT: His crib is smashed to bits, huh. So I wasn't the only one who had a grudge against him. You say there's a body in there? Maybe that's him? Can't be sure, but I'll have the boys check it out.
data.63972db222ea23711e21aaaa: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7dbc31943b749b5021ec3: Locate the improvised jail warden's apartment on Streets of Tarkov
data.63a7dbefee7b4d0d5507baf8: Find out what happened to the warden
data.639135d89444fb141f4e6eea description: Good afternoon, mercenary. You're just in time, I have an errand for you. I need to determine how many people have gone missing in the city. To do this, I need a list of all the residents of the city and subtract the already evacuated, the dead, and those who found shelter in the hospital. Your task is to find that list of residents. Bring me the journal from Primorsky District's Housing Department.
data.639135d89444fb141f4e6eea successMessageT: Mercenary, you know firsthand how many lives are lost in war. But you have no idea how many die not from a bullet or a knife, but by going missing. Some are buried in the concrete in their own home after the bombing. Someone died in their basement from exhaustion because they couldn't find food. Someone was swallowed by infection because they didn't have the necessary medicine and couldn't get to a hospital because of constant shelling... And there are at least fifteen percent of people like that in this journal.
data.639135d89444fb141f4e6eeb: Obtain the journal containing resident details
data.639135e0fa894f0a866afde6 description: Greetings, mercenary. The hospital continues to receive more intoxicated patients. Each day there are more and more of them, and that worries me. It feels like if you destroy one drug den, two new ones appear. We should go another route, try to cure those who are already addicted. In order to do that, I need a sample of the drug for analysis.
data.639135e0fa894f0a866afde6 successMessageT: Thank you for a job well done. Take your reward over there.
data.639135e0fa894f0a866afde7: Obtain the container with drug samples
data.63a7d64710b7a13eb015961f: Locate the chemical laboratory on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135e8c115f907b14700aa description: Hello, friend... You know, I wasn't always alone. Loneliness does not bother me, of course, especially since I have a neural net if I want to talk to someone really intelligent... Still, lately it's been weighing on me to think about my relatives. My brother and his wife and kids - will you look them up? The Samoylovs, they lived in Concordia. My brother drove a very recognizable car with a tiger aerography... It might be easier to find them through his car.
data.639135e8c115f907b14700aa successMessageT: So, this is a recording of the first hour after the events began... There, you see his car? And there's him. Okay, they're getting in the car, driving away... They should have left before the shelling started. What a relief!
data.639135e8c115f907b14700ab: Obtain the data on vehicle movement at the Concordia residential complex parking lot on Streets of Tarkov
data.639135f286e646067c176a87 description: Good morning! You've done a great job of finding the military vehicles. According to my sources, there were at least three Strykers in the city. You know, it's not a good idea to leave that kind of equipment out in the open in these conditions. I need a lead on them. You know what to do.
data.639135f286e646067c176a87 successMessageT: You did an amazing job, mercenary! What's the condition of the vehicles? I'm sure we'll be able to fix it, and you'll see more Strykers on the streets of the city in the future... What? Of course, I hope it doesn't come to that!
data.63927f14744e452011470816: Locate and mark the first Stryker with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.63927f2d8ba6894d155e77e6: Locate and mark the second Stryker with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.63927f349444fb141f4e6f24: Locate and mark the third Stryker with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.639cebb78fe84d33a25a142b: Survive and extract from the location
data.639136d68ba6894d155e77cf description: Those bloody westerners! All they want to do is shoot everybody! It's already been negotiated, we even paid them to let us through! But no, they want to spill more of our blood! All right, soldier, come here and listen. A convoy was passing through town. With important cargo. Very important. Even I don't know what's in it. Somebody took money for the convoy's safe passage, and then the convoy went dark. Think about it, such bastards! Find out what's going on and if anything could be saved. And find out where the shooting came from...
data.639136d68ba6894d155e77cf successMessageT: The convoy was swept clean, huh? So it was all planned from the beginning... But the main vehicle wasn't breached, that's the main thing. The shooting started from the car dealership? So it was Kaban... Oh, sorry, I'm just thinking out loud, I'll have to think it over. Thank you. Come back later.
data.639cee16f5765f47cc7f0ea1: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d53904d3dc28a52a2100: Locate the cargo convoy on Streets of Tarkov
data.639136df4b15ca31f76bc31f description: Let's keep clearing the city of criminals, right, kid? There are a lot of looters at the Pinewood Hotel, taking whatever they see. Help me out, and I'll make sure to reward you for making the air in Tarkov cleaner. After you're done, make sure to signal me with the yellow flare in the courtyard.
data.639136df4b15ca31f76bc31f successMessageT: Well done, kid. Together we'll restore order.
data.639285879444fb141f4e6f25: Deal with the looters at the Pinewood hotel on Streets of Tarkov
data.63aaccae87413d64ae079631: Shoot a yellow signal flare in the hotel's courtyard
data.639136e84ed9512be67647db description: I'm stumped today, warrior. There are good people who need to escape the city. The closest they can get is through Avenue of Death, but there are snipers overlooking the whole area. One kid told me that if you shoot a signal flare there, the snipers should let you pass through, in that particular spot. But who knows if the kid was lying? Maybe he's trying to lead us to death. How do we find out if it's true that the snipers will stop firing after the signal... I got a couple flares lying around, why don't you go check it out, eh?
data.639136e84ed9512be67647db successMessageT: So he was correct, it is the cease fire condition, I'll keep that in mind. You really put your head on the line, didn't you? I respect that.
data.63929101744e452011470818: Survive and extract from Streets of Tarkov through Klimov Street
data.639136f086e646067c176a8b description: Oh, howdy. Help an old soldier out, will you? Those damn snipers are shooting my couriers like rabbits in an open field. Sitting on the rooftops and blasting non-stop. Take them out and I'll make it worth your while.
data.639136f086e646067c176a8b successMessageT: Good shit, warrior, now that's some proper shooting!
data.63929224744e45201147081a: Eliminate the snipers on the rooftops on Streets of Tarkov
data.639d00a28fe84d33a25a142f: Survive and extract from the location
data.639136fa9444fb141f4e6eee description: Friend, there is another task, an unusual one. One of my clients was living in the area of the hotel when the events began. And he had reason to believe he was being watched. He saw a couple of leaked photos from the hotel courtyard. We need to find the room where the rat is sitting. Most likely, you'll find something if you look for tech: cameras, bugs... Anything you find, give it to me. It'll come in handy.
data.639136fa9444fb141f4e6eee successMessageT: Yeah, I don't usually do this kind of thing, but this customer orders lots of weapons from me, so I didn't want to lose him... Thanks, friend.
data.63a7d8665199ab1f7d4a7747: Locate the surveillance spot on Streets of Tarkov
data.63913703e705511c8a4a1b7c description: Hey brother, you like motorcycles? I've got a customer who's a real fan of them. He just got his A-levels and he's ready to race. You know the song? "On the back of a Harley he took me for a ride in the sky"? That's exactly what the kid wants to do. Only they don't import Harley to us no more, you know, sanctions and all that. I promised my client I'd get him a proper bike... How's he gonna get it running, I wonder. All the equipment's blacked out, I don't know. Buy a new one? I'm not a moron. They're free in this town, you just have to find them. One Scav guy said he saw a bike in the car dealership, but he's not sure if it's a Harley or not. Anyway, look for bikes in town. There were some at the Lighthouse too. Nah, you don't need to bring 'em in. I know you, you'll bring them back with bullet holes in them. Just mark them with the strobes, my men will handle it from there.
data.63913703e705511c8a4a1b7c successMessageT: You're way over the top, man! I'll even give you a bonus. You're a great partner, brother. My business says thank you very much. By the way, don't you want a bike of your own? You'd look good on it.
data.639d93e2ad9d7e3216668fd5: Locate and mark the first motorcycle with an MS2000 Marker on Lighthouse
data.639d93ff2a994a11600df105: Locate and mark the second motorcycle with an MS2000 Marker on Lighthouse
data.639d941adae1800a3e1359b4: Locate and mark the motorcycle with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.639d97b25573fd6cc27d99c1: Survive and extract from Streets of Tarkov
data.63913715f8e5dd32bf4e3aaa description: Friend, remember when you and I shut down that broadcast with the jammer at the Lighthouse? These people started it up again. The guys showed me the tape, it's just... I'm speechless. I regret watching it. Can you find a new location where the broadcast is coming from? From the surroundings, it looks like some kind of grocery store.
data.63913715f8e5dd32bf4e3aaa successMessageT: So the grocery store, right? And the camera was left there? Thank you, noted. I'll send a specialist. If the camera survived, maybe we can uncover something. It's a shady case, so go find Jaeger, I'll inform him.
data.639da5ec8fe84d33a25a1435: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d99804d3dc28a52a2106: Locate the place of bloody broadcast inside the grocery store on Streets of Tarkov
data.6391372c8ba6894d155e77d7 description: It's the same story again, a new recording, now with a strange symbol. What the hell is going on? People are being sacrificed. To whom? Why? So many questions, yet no answers. I keep thinking it's the worst we'll ever see, but every time I'm proven wrong. We've fought looters with only money on their minds. Murderers who just want to shoot innocents, too. But at least I understand the motivation there, the beast has defeated the human in their soul. But with what purpose do people become these... I cannot understand this. So, soldier, I'll look for them in the woods, you do the same in the city. Somewhere there must be their hideout. Look for the same symbol, I'm sure we'll see it again.
data.6391372c8ba6894d155e77d7 successMessageT: Did you find it? Where? Was there anyone there? What does the symbol mean? Even more questions...
data.639da86bad9d7e3216668fd7: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d6d61f06d111271f5aeb: Locate the cultist meeting spot on Streets of Tarkov
data.639137709444fb141f4e6ef2 description: Looking for a job, young man? I think I have something for you. Have you heard that before all these events in Tarkov, people started experiencing strange symptoms? I'd like to find out more about it, maybe the wars that followed had something to do with it. And please, don't divulge my hypothesis to anyone. You'll need to find at least one medical journal that lists the symptoms. Look in the ambulance vehicles, a medical journal might be in any of them. Be careful in your search.
data.639137709444fb141f4e6ef2 successMessageT: Did you find it? Give it to me. That's right, it's the data I needed.
data.639137709444fb141f4e6ef3: Obtain the medical observation records on Streets of Tarkov
data.6391d90f4ed9512be67647df description: Lightkeeper said he's ready to accept you in again. But the old flash drive doesn't work anymore, so you'll have to find a new one, reflash the transmitter, and give it to me. I'll update your transmitter properly.
data.6391d90f4ed9512be67647df successMessageT: Hope all this mess doesn't happen again.
data.6391d9ba4b15ca31f76bc325: Obtain the V3 Flash drive on Lighthouse
data.6391d912f8e5dd32bf4e3ab2 description: Lightkeeper said he's ready to accept you in again. But the old flash drive doesn't work anymore, so you'll have to find a new one, reflash the transmitter, and give it to me. I'll update your transmitter properly.
data.6391d912f8e5dd32bf4e3ab2 successMessageT: Hope all this mess doesn't happen again.
data.6391d9c5f8e5dd32bf4e3ab4: Obtain the V3 Flash drive on Lighthouse
data.6391d9144b15ca31f76bc323 description: Lightkeeper said he's ready to accept you in again. But the old flash drive doesn't work anymore, so you'll have to find a new one, reflash the transmitter, and give it to me. I'll update your transmitter properly.
data.6391d9144b15ca31f76bc323 successMessageT: Hope all this mess doesn't happen again.
data.6391d9cffa894f0a866afdea: Obtain the V3 Flash drive on Lighthouse
data.639282134ed9512be67647ed description: Mercenary, there is a task for you. There's been a large firefight in the city. Someone ambushed a convoy carrying critical cargo. I'm sure it's the treacherous BEARs, but we'll have to make sure. At this point, it's not as critical to eliminate these war criminals as it is to make sure the cargo is still intact. Go there and report back.
data.639282134ed9512be67647ed successMessageT: The cargo is in place, that's reassuring. If the attack was from a car dealership, then it wasn't the BEARs. So it's Kaban again... Thank you for your work.
data.639cdf9aad9d7e3216668fd0: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d444f32fa1316250c3d5: Locate the cargo convoy on Streets of Tarkov
data.63966faeea19ac7ed845db2c description: Now, let's begin. I have heard rumors that a certain group of people have decided to stick their noses into my business. I, as you can imagine, am not satisfied with that kind of activity. Your job is to gather information from someone who's always hanging around mercenaries like you, and find out who these people are. You got to figure it out at all costs, okay? Talk to the car evac drivers, they certainly know about this kind of business. I'm sure they won't give you anything for just a hearty thanks, so you'll have to work hard. Understood? Go on, then.
data.6397a2eee5d9c6753c61e2d8: Survive and extract from Woods through Bridge V-Ex
data.6397a3b6f376f0344e45711b: Survive and extract from Customs through Dorms V-Ex
data.6397a47fe5d9c6753c61e2da: Survive and extract from Interchange through Power Station V-Ex
data.6397a5cbdcdd126fef173f36: Survive and extract from Streets of Tarkov through Primorsky Ave Taxi V-Ex
data.6397a6942e519e69d2139b25: Locate and mark the first Patrol-A armored vehicle with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.6397a7ce706b793c7d6094c9: Locate and mark the second Patrol-A armored vehicle with an MS2000 Marker on Streets of Tarkov
data.63966faeea19ac7ed845db2c completePlayerM: I managed to contact the drivers. This wasn't easy, but I did unearth something interesting.
data.63966fbeea19ac7ed845db2e description: The informant set up a meeting near the car dealership, at a hidden spot? So why the hell are you still here? If he gets busted while you're still here, look for a hidden hideout, a spare key for it must be somewhere in there too. Find everything he's dug up. Don't let me down.
data.63966fbeea19ac7ed845db2e successMessageT: It looks like the rumors have been confirmed after all. Someone really dared to start undermining me. These snakes are going to meet at the old federal reserve base, to transfer information. Come back later, while I figure out what to do about it.
data.639909041c712b1e1d4dafca: Locate the informant's hideout on Streets of Tarkov
data.63990952e101160ce056d655: Obtain the key to the second hideout
data.63a7ce31cc389e31a64596d8: Locate the informant's hideout on Streets of Tarkov
data.63abf37987413d64ae0ac215: Obtain the key to the second hideout
data.63966fbeea19ac7ed845db2e completePlayerM: The informant was already dead when I arrived. It seems he kept all the important details in his diary. Here you go.
data.63966fccac6f8f3c677b9d89 description: You're here, good. Now listen carefully. My men went to the meeting place, their job was to replace the folder these snakes were so diligently preparing with the one I had arranged, but it's already been several hours since my group stopped responding. The last time they contacted me, they reported seeing a group of Rogues. Knight and his men are not aware of this operation, perhaps one of them interfered with the delivery. The first thing you must do is to check the Rogues' base and find the lost data, but don't go to them right away, or they'll figure out I'm involved and will start asking questions. Then you'll have to deliver it to the federal reserve base, a meeting place has been set up at the machinery and equipment repair center. Find that folder and leave at the base, and bring the real one to me. It's crucial to deliver this information to me. It's time to find out who these suicidal moles are.
data.63966fccac6f8f3c677b9d89 successMessageT: Welcome back. Now, let's see what they're up to.
data.6399b45d98e4ed53fa4632db: Obtain the forged intelligence at the Rogue base on Lighthouse
data.6399c929d65735732c6ba766: Obtain the original intelligence in the repair station on Reserve
data.6399ca5fe101160ce05706ac: Stash the forged intelligence under the BMP-2 in place of the original
data.6399cc30b5992f573c65782b: Bring the original intelligence to Lightkeeper
data.63966fccac6f8f3c677b9d89 completePlayerM: I'm back, everything went well. The dirt is in its intended place, and here is the original. Enjoy the read.
data.63966fd9ea19ac7ed845db30 description: Well, the situation became plain enough. This group of hotshots is, as it turns out, run by Glukhar, an ex-marine who settled at the Reserve base with his crew. That's where he took the documents you planted. Who'd have thought he'd have the nerve to undermine me? Well, he signed his own sentence. Hunt them down and settle the matter. When it's done, give a signal with a flare rocket from high ground, and I'll send men to their lair to sort out their junk. We need to find out what else they've been digging up. As soon as you've fired the signal, you take the shortest possible route straight to me.
data.63966fd9ea19ac7ed845db30 successMessageT: Saw the signal, great job. I advise you not to go to the base while my men are out there working.
data.6397af5cf376f0344e457120: Survive and extract from Reserve through Cliff Descent
data.63a9ad4cc31b00242d28a99d: Shoot a yellow signal flare at the radar station
data.63966fd9ea19ac7ed845db30 completePlayerM: Shortest route possible straight to you. The job is done.
data.63966fe7ea74a47c2d3fc0e6 description: The whole thing is starting to become clearer. It seems that the customer is not from around here, as I initially assumed. The order came from the beyond the border. I have contacts who are willing to assist, but they will need a favor in return. They own a certain, shall we say, facility, located in the Priozersky Natural Reserve. You can see the facility from everywhere, but nobody has a clue what is hiding under the mountain. If you've been in those places, you must have seen the hill that towers over the entire forest. So, some curious tourists began to flock around that hill, and they are itching to open all the doors they see. As you know, curiosity killed the cat. Do the right thing and get rid of those cats. And while you're there, leave the documents for the USECs in their camp. Remember, these documents must not fall into the wrong hands.
data.63966fe7ea74a47c2d3fc0e6 successMessageT: You've done well, mercenary. You will be a useful asset. Come back later, there's still some unfinished business to take care of.
data.639914b61c712b1e1d4dafcb: Eliminate PMC operatives around the mountain area on Woods
data.639915f339cb4711771bedc6: TerraGroupの "ブルーフォルダー" を USEC キャンプ内の黒い SUV の中に隠す
data.63991601deadb12b2d7c6027: TerraGroupの "ブルーフォルダー" を USEC キャンプ内の衛星アンテナ付近の木箱に隠す
data.63966fe7ea74a47c2d3fc0e6 completePlayerM: All nosy people are no longer nosy. I've stashed all the documents. Tell the USECs I said hi.
data.63966ff54c3ef01b6f3ffad8 description: Time is of the essence. My cleaner crew found evidence of Glukhar's connection to the arms development that took place under the aegis of TerraGroup. The next task for you is to provoke Glukhar's contacts into doing something foolish. They probably don't know yet that Glukhar is no longer available. Go to Ultra, TerraGroup has had a staging post there since the early days. Make a mess of it, make a show of it. Use the trophy you took from the bull's body. And for the particularly savvy, leave something humiliating in place to say hello, so to speak. The mutts must know their place.
data.63966ff54c3ef01b6f3ffad8 successMessageT: So, you left a message for our friends, now we'll wait for a reaction. For now, you can go.
data.639a76e3e4aa7349085cb6e3: Eliminate any enemy around the Kiba Arms store while using an ASh-12 on Interchange
data.639a77b97cb1a8023d49f683: Stash a Salty Dog beef sausage inside the Kiba Arms store
data.639a78046402c537c15d012f: Stash a Bottle of Fierce Hatchling moonshine inside the secret secure hideout
data.639a78c27cb1a8023d49f684: Stash a Toilet paper inside the secret container stash
data.639a79785e3c9b787264d672: Survive and extract from the location
data.639670029113f06a7c3b2377 description: The message found its recipient. Rats on a sinking ship began to scurry. The customers gave orders to destroy all evidence of ongoing developments. Your mission is to infiltrate TerraGroup's lab, find the data carrier containing the data we need, and deliver it to me. What are you waiting for, a candy for good luck? Hurry up!
data.639670029113f06a7c3b2377 successMessageT: Do you have the recorder? Perfect, give it to me. It will take time to complete the decoding. I'll let you know when we're done.
data.639ae49a5e3c9b787264d675: Obtain the secured tape inside the manager's office
data.639670029113f06a7c3b2377 completePlayerM: I searched all over the laboratory and managed to find this. I hope this is it.
data.6396700fea19ac7ed845db32 description: The situation takes an interesting turn. The data you delivered to me suggests that these moles were involved in the attack on the government convoy in the city, at the intersection of Nikitskaya Street and Primorsky Avenue, which means that from time to time they inhabit those parts. Your job is to scout the area, prepare and equip some good positions to monitor the area. Nothing more than that for now. I already have a marksman for the job. You will need a silencer for .338 from AI and a Trijicon thermal imager.
data.6396700fea19ac7ed845db32 successMessageT: All the equipment is in place, over... Okay, mercenary, you're going to have to work hard for the next part.
data.639c31e579d86f66070507d8: Locate a good sniping position in Concordia overlooking the construction site
data.639c359f0a20a7001f00c7a8: Hide AI Tactical Sound Moderator .338 LM near the red table
data.639c394deb92d6238e058de8: Locate a good sniping position at Primorsky overlooking the movie theater
data.639c39807c1532d85b0162a9: Hide Trijicon REAP-IR thermal scope under Makhors' bed
data.639c3e21a1c5f814670c35e8: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7d2acee7b4d0d5507baf2: Locate a good sniping position in Concordia overlooking the construction site
data.63a7d315f32fa1316250c3d2: Locate a good sniping position at Primorsky overlooking the movie theater
data.6396700fea19ac7ed845db32 completePlayerM: I'm back. Everything you asked for is at the place.
data.6396701b9113f06a7c3b2379 description: It seems that before my marksman decides to take risks at your prepared positions, he needs proof of your skill as an experienced spotter. Which makes sense. Time allows, thankfully. Let's just say there are snipers in and around the city who are operating out of their positions. Improve your counter-sniper skills, and then my man will trust you. Go on then, seven feet under the keel.
data.6396701b9113f06a7c3b2379 successMessageT: We've been watching you. My shooter gave the go-ahead. That's all for now. I'll let you know when the time comes.
data.6397ac912e519e69d2139b26: Eliminate Sniper Scavs from over 350 meters away
data.639a169e6cd47c525121a116: Reach the required Sniper Rifles skill level
data.6396701b9113f06a7c3b2379 completePlayerM: I'm a real psycho sniper now. So, what's next?
data.63967028c4a91c5cb76abd81 description: So much for Primorsky Avenue. What other secrets does this city hold? It turns out that these wretches have decided to make an attempt on my humble person because I could get my hands on the cargo which was carried by this very convoy. The simple-minded snakes don't even realize that they're the ones who led me to this cargo with their own hands. Did they really think they could scare me with some cheap blackmail? Me?! All right, listen to me, your job is to secure the area around the intersection and mark the location of the cargo with a beacon. My men will do the rest.
data.63967028c4a91c5cb76abd81 successMessageT: The positions for Zryachy that you recently prepared have come in handy. He successfully eliminated several conspirators. Now, after you've cleaned up the area and marked the cargo, it's just a matter of opening the secured door and finding out what was it that they were transporting that was so valuable. Judging by the people involved in this conspiracy, there may be something in there that could blow the heads off not only of the corporation, but of some very high-ranking people as well. Looks like we're in for some great business, mercenary. Keep in touch.
data.639ae6f26cd47c525121a1d2: Locate the transport holding the cargo on Streets of Tarkov
data.639ae7423174277743234bb7: Secure the area from hostile PMC operatives
data.639aea2228d8a21b593a3491: Mark the cargo area with an MS2000 Marker
data.639b002fda859817035a344b: Survive and extract from the location
data.63bd64552803ffbfad0e3e48: Locate the transport holding the cargo on Streets of Tarkov
data.63bd64ba3d34b0e64b0d0a17: Launch a yellow flare near the armored convoy to confirm that the job is done
data.63967028c4a91c5cb76abd81 completePlayerM: The cargo is marked, the area is under control. I hope it was worth it.
data.639872f9decada40426d3447 description: Oh, hello there. Do you like hunting? Elk, deer... I've always been somewhat neutral about hunting, even though I love my gunsmithing craft. Well, anyway, that's what I'm getting at. There's a new order, and I wanted to ask you to help with it. I need an upgraded Simonov carbine, with a silencer and optic scope. 20-round or larger mag, ergonomics over 35, recoil sum no more than 350.
data.639872f9decada40426d3447 successMessageT: Oh, you've done it rather quick. Thank you!
data.63987404e5163c24b3029356: Modify an OP-SKS to comply with the given specifications
data.639872fa9b4fb827b200d8e5 description: Oh, hey. There's an unusual matter that has come up. I don't often get orders for pistols, but this is a special occasion. We need a SIG P226R, Stainless Elite Wooden grip, Stainless Elite slide, extended magazine and a flashlight. Ergonomics not below 80, recoil sum not above 610. A weapon for true enthusiasts.
data.639872fa9b4fb827b200d8e5 successMessageT: All set? Thanks for your help. Boy, I wish I had one of those in my collection...
data.6398776f93ae507d5858c3a8: Modify an P226R to comply with the given specifications
data.639872fc93ae507d5858c3a6 description: Perfect timing, friend. If you have time, help me out with some gun customization. A major customer has placed an order for a KRISS Vector 9x19 submachine gun. He wants it to be equipped with an Mk.5 Modular Rail mount, Tactical Dynamics Skeletonized Foregrip, a scope of your choice, magazine with at least 33 rounds, and a silencer. Ergonomics over 50 and recoil under 200. Thanks!
data.639872fc93ae507d5858c3a6 successMessageT: You know, I prefer forty-five personally, but a Vector is a Vector! What a beautiful beast.
data.63987860c8f8cc12a47b02a6: Modify a KRISS Vector 9x19 to comply with the given specifications
data.639872fe8871e1272b10ccf6 description: Hello. There is a new order for a Western HK 416A5 rifle. Requires tan-colored attachments: SureFire SOCOM556-RC2 silencer, Magpul RVG tactical grip, EOTech EXPS3 holographic sight, Magpul MOE pistol grip, Magpul UBR GEN2 stock and LA-5B/PEQ tactical module. Ergonomics over 60, recoil sum under 250, weight 4 kilos or lower. Just like in Special Forces, right? Oh, and try to find a rifle that isn't thrashed, technical condition must be at least 80%.
data.639872fe8871e1272b10ccf6 successMessageT: A real door kicker blaster! Thank you for the help, mercenary.
data.639879addecada40426d3449: Modify an HK 416A5 to comply with the given specifications
data.639873003693c63d86328f25 description: Hi, I have a job for you. I need an SVDS in the following config: black Magpul UBR GEN2 buttstock, SAG MK1 chassis, black Magpul MOE pistol grip, March Tactical 3-24x42 FFP scope and a suppressor. Ergonomics should be at least 15 and the recoil sum no higher than 400.
data.639873003693c63d86328f25 successMessageT: You're done? Excellent. Leave it on the table next to me, I'm a bit busy at the moment...
data.63987a4e3693c63d86328f27: Modify an SVDS to comply with the given specifications
data.63987301e11ec11ff5504036 description: I have an interesting order here. Not just one usual piece of art, but two in one order. I think you can do it. The first piece is a Remington Model 700 sniper rifle with a full AB Arms body kit, with powerful optic and a silencer. Ergonomics not less than 35, recoil sum - less than 400. And make it lightweight, with a small magazine. The second piece is a Colt M1911 pistol, with a Pachmayr grip, Anarchy Outdoors muzzle brake and a flashlight of any kind.
data.63987301e11ec11ff5504036 successMessageT: Okay, I see the bolty, and what about the handgun? There it is, my precious. Good work, friend. The next order is coming in tomorrow, so you can go do your own work until then.
data.63987b49cd51826f7a069b85: Modify an M700 to comply with the given specifications
data.63987b9c05aa481907106505: Modify an M1911 to comply with the given specifications
data.639dbaf17c898a131e1cffff description: Oi, there you are! Looking for a job, mate? There's a guy who owes me a lot of money. He's a real cunt, pretends to be a hard-ass, but he's not paying his debts anymore. His deadline's long gone. Gotta teach him a lesson. My guys saw him at the hotel the other day, he rented a room on the second floor.
data.639dbaf17c898a131e1cffff successMessageT: What, got pierced by a crowbar? No fucking way! You know, mate, I haven't been having much luck lately. You want to punish this one, he's already dead. You look for the other one, others found him before we did. If we can't get anyone by the ass, maybe you should slow down a little bit. Otherwise, I ain't sending you out looking for anybody else. You're a damn death bringer.
data.639dbba35b759c65a3476549: Survive and extract from the location
data.63a7cd3aee7b4d0d5507baee: Find the debtor on Streets of Tarkov
data.63a511ea30d85e10e375b045 description: Hello, Mechanic gave me the gist of the situation. It's horrible, gives me the creeps. But we have to get to the truth. And you know what's even worse? The camera that Mechanic's techs looked at contained not only the recordings we knew of, but also even more at different places. As if someone is playing with us and wants us to see these recordings. There was an old house, with corpses at the table, like in a biblical story. Find this place, something's not right about this.
data.63a511ea30d85e10e375b045 successMessageT: Did you find it? That's the place, you're saying? And the camera is there again? Don't touch any of it, I'll have Mechanic's specialists take it all apart.
data.63a511ea30d85e10e375b047: Survive and extract from the location
data.63ac22b8f627f540861d1b2d: Locate the place of bloody broadcast inside the old house on Streets of Tarkov
data.63a5cf262964a7488f5243ce description: Greetings! Well, let's get it going, are you excited? The task is quite specific, we need to test the Russian toy for close combat, so that the conditions were the very real combat in urban environment. I have customers who don't believe in the effectiveness of this toy... Can you change their minds?
data.63a5cf262964a7488f5243ce successMessageT: Well? Does it work good? Suitable for close-quarters combat in urban environments?
data.63a5cf262964a7488f5243d1: Eliminate PMC operatives while using an SR-2M "Veresk" with a suppressor and KP-SR2 reflex sight on Streets of Tarkov
data.63a88045abf76d719f42d715 description: Оh! Come on in, I've got a job for you! Listen, how long ago have you been in town? Well, I got a job for you. Run through the supermarkets, see if they've been looted. And do the old man a favor and look for the Salt Dog sausage or something like that. Mechanic kindly introduced it to me, and now I'm craving it. It's killing me!
data.63a88045abf76d719f42d715 successMessageT: So, how's the situation out there? Nothing left? Bloody looters! But did you find the sausage? Haha, what a miracle! But what about the expiration date?
data.63a98cfbc31b00242d28a95b: Scout the Shestyorochka store at Nikitskaya street
data.63a98d24655ec5555b4aa9e7: Scout the Sparja store at Primorsky ave
data.63a98d39da7999196148ba3a: Scout the Sparja store in Pinewood hotel
data.63a98d60c0f61a5d8731cd9f: Scout the Goshan store in Concordia
data.63a98cdf655ec5555b4aa9e6: Hand over the found in raid Salty Dog beef sausage
data.63a9ae24009ffc6a551631a5 description: All right, soldier! Listen up! No bitching. You know I don't want to risk the lives of soldiers whose families are waiting for them at home. And I don't want to ruin the statistics. So it's up to you, desperate one. I need to clear out a gang or two of marauders for my records. So be choosy with your tools, all right? Come on, come on, you won't be left short. Move it!
data.63a9ae24009ffc6a551631a5 successMessageT: Is it done? Great. Motherland won't forget this. Now take your reward and fuck off. I have a lot of work to do.
data.63a9ae63da7999196148ba5c: Eliminate any hostile from over 100 meters away while using AK-74 series weapons
data.63a9b229813bba58a50c9ee5 description: Hello mercenary! You know, the job of a peacekeeper is a very difficult one. Peacekeepers are expected to strike a strict balance between the warring parties, and often we find ourselves in the worst kinds of situations. In general, the UN is as interested in a speedy resolution of the conflict as the local authorities. But the local criminal elements are making it difficult. So my superiors require me to achieve new results in the fight against the looters. But how can I do it without casualties among the UN forces? Do you see where I'm going with this?
data.63a9b229813bba58a50c9ee5 successMessageT: You did it? Well done! It's all about the greater good!
data.63a9b229813bba58a50c9ee6: Eliminate any hostile from over 100 meters away while using AR-15 platform weapons
data.63a9b36cc31b00242d28a99f description: Well, hello there, mercenary. Come to see the old man? Sit down, would you like some tea? No? All right, then. Listen, a gang of looters showed up in the area again. We've got to get them away from this place for good, so that even those who come after them would have a heart attack. So I'm thinking, why don't you take an axe and chop them the fuck up, eh? Can you do that? I don't think any bastard's gonna dare get into that bloodbath afterwards.
data.63a9b36cc31b00242d28a99f successMessageT: Why the hell did you not clean yourself up before showing up in here? Here, take your reward and off you go. Jesus Christ, what's with the kids these days. Take your showers!
data.63a9b3d7813bba58a50c9ee9: Eliminate Scavs while using melee weapons on daytime Factory
data.63a9b41dad5cc12f22162022: Eliminate Scavs while using melee weapons on Streets of Tarkov

data.63ab180c87413d64ae0ac20a description: Young man, hello! How is your health? Nothing bothering you? The thing is, one of my messengers who transports the poor stranded people in the city is worried about the lack of an escort on the next route. Could you meet with him and go for a ride with him? I promise you won't be shortchanged! He'll be waiting for you on Primorsky Avenue, in a black SUV.
data.63ab180c87413d64ae0ac20a successMessageT: How was the ride, a breeze? From now on, don't hesitate to use the driver's services. He's a reliable worker.
data.63ab184ff627f540861d1185: Survive and extract from Streets of Tarkov through Primorsky Ave Taxi V-Ex
data.641dbfd7f43eda9d810d7137 description: It's not in my nature to be asking on behalf of others, but an acquaintance of mine desperately needs your help! She has a patient who is in critical condition and needs to be treated urgently. This person is extremely important to some... influential people. She has the medications she needs, but needs bandaging supplies. I would be very grateful if you could help!
data.641dbfd7f43eda9d810d7137 successMessageT: ありがとう、傭兵さん！患者の無事を祈りましょう。手術は成功したし、後はこの人自身の回復力次第ね。
data.64217bb03f80fc6c0a018fc4: 軍用 救急包帯 を渡す
data.64764abcd125ab430a14ccb5 description:
お前さんに重要な仕事を任せたい。かなり危険が伴う仕事だが、その価値はあるはずだ。

この地域で有名な人物が、自身の所有するアリーナの掃除屋を辞めて逃亡した2人の従業員を探すために "猟犬" と呼ばれる者たちを放ったらしい。逃げた掃除屋のひとりは元PMCで、私が信頼している昔からの友人だ。もう一方は最近、名前をよく聞くようになった Scav の若者で リジー という。彼らは多くのことを知っているし、基本的には善良な心の持ち主なんだ。だからこそ、みすみす猟犬どもの餌食にさせるわけにはいかない。

なんとかしてアリーナの連中に追跡を諦めさせなくては......。ただし、その辺のごろつきよりも手強いだろうから充分に気を付けてくれ。どうだ、やってもらえるか？
data.64764abcd125ab430a14ccb5 failMessageText: 強引にやり過ぎたのか？それとも、どこか具合が悪いのか？少なくとも2番目の理由なら理解はできるが……。まだ力は残っていると？だったら、戻って仕事をやり遂げてくれ。
data.64764abcd125ab430a14ccb5 successMessageT: 有言実行をする男には敬意を払わなくてはな！善い人を助けるために本当に良くやってくれた。さあ、入ってこい、君のために取って置いたものがあるんだ。
data.647710905320c660d91c15a5 description: All right, mate, come in quick, got work to do. So listen up. Something really fishy's going on. Those big shots and foreign thugs are doing some kind of murky shit at night with some of the locals. I tried to investigate and maybe get my cut, but got fucked over. They didn't cut me in, those muts. Help a brother out, teach those bastards a lesson, show them who's the real deal in this town, so that it doesn't happen again.
data.647710905320c660d91c15a5 successMessageT: What hoods? What marks? What foreigners? Are you high or something? Why the fuck did you kill them?! Well, whatever, job's done, and that's that. Others will get the hint, I imagine.

data.64916da7ad4e722c106f2345 description:
Well, hello there. Come in, there's something I need you to do.
An unpleasant situation has arisen. As you know, my little hobby is in demand among the remaining residents of this great city. But here's the trouble, one of the rifles I assembled fell into the wrong hands and ended up in the hands of those who draw their circles around town. Scavs found it in one of the circles and accused me of supplying the creeps with weapons. I don't need that kind of complaint. Do the job, cut through the ranks of these artists. And I'll make sure to find a decent reward. And another thing, try not to harm Scavs. Enough trouble with them as it is.
data.64916da7ad4e722c106f2345 failMessageText: Scav の相手はするなと言ったじゃないか！
data.64916da7ad4e722c106f2345 successMessageT: 終わったかい？良い手際だね。報酬は郵送で送るよ。じゃあ、また。
data.64916dc0ad4e722c106f2345: 各地に奇妙な魔方陣を描いている集団の指導者を殺す

data.649567f359eab30d1b7c9585 description: Hello mercenary! Heard what happened at the Lighthouse? My sources tell me the local crime lords have had a big dispute with the Rogues, and they're looking all over the city and the outskirts for them. The task is to help these Rogues. Because disturbing the peace and order on my watch is forbidden. Understood?
data.649567f359eab30d1b7c9585 successMessageT: 終わったのか？よくやった。これが報酬だ。

data.649af47d717cb30e7e4b5e26 description: Opa, hey there! So listen up, there's this big chemist guy in the city. Makes all kinds of fucked-up drugs. And there's a rumor going around that he created some new stimulant. The bums say they saw a jacked-up PMC merc running around the block like a fucking lunatic, dodging bullets Neo style. But then he tripped over a rock and gone to forever sleep, can you believe it? Looks like that chemo took a toll on his health. There's a price to pay for everything in life... Find out what kind of drugs he was stoned on and if there's any reason to peddle that shit.
data.649af47d717cb30e7e4b5e26 failMessageText: What, couldn't test it right? Well shit, do it again then. While the body's young and strong.
data.649af47d717cb30e7e4b5e26 successMessageT: The fuck? You sure the chemist ain't messing with the ingredients? Anyway, well done. Here's your reward.
data.649af4cdd86e091957223195: Eliminate PMC operatives while under the influence of the "Obdolbos" cocktail
data.649c293f8f177306a0742b55: You must not die or leave the raid while the task is active (Status: KIA, Left the Action, MIA)
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Good, good. You've done well, mercenary. You're free to go.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: Good, good. You've done well, mercenary. You're free to go.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 593: Ah, mercenary, do you want to do a good deed? My clients are asking to ensure a safe area to conduct a specific secret operation. I would like to appoint you for this, as you are the most competent of the local workers. You will have to survey the area and report back to me. Good luck, mercenary.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Well, guess it’s time to head out then. Thank you, kid.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: Well, guess it’s time to head out then. Thank you, kid.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5c0: Come on in for some tea, kid. I'm preparing to go hunting today, and could use some scouting in the area. Can you go check it out? I'd be grateful.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I've already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: All clear, you say? Good work then, soldier.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: All clear, you say? Good work then, soldier.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Ah, warrior. Listen, I need some help with scouting a location - need to walk around a couple of places, check out the situation there, maybe find escape routes. Not for free - you'll get rewarded, of course. Alright, pack up, we'll be waiting for your news.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Alright, here's my map, show me what you found. Good, I'll let the clients know. Thank you, friend.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: Alright, here's my map, show me what you found. Good, I'll let the clients know. Thank you, friend.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5a7: Mercenary, do you have a minute? I've prepared an order for the clients, but they need a guarantee that the way to the meeting spot is safe. If you aren't busy, can you find a route for them? Find a safe passage, a way to leave safely, you get me. Thank you, I’ll owe you one.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: So, how's the situation? Good, all going well then.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: So, how's the situation? Good, all going well then.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 583: C'mere, mister operator, let's talk. How are you doing, lad, busy? Not busy then. I need to scout an area so that my things go smoothly. Go check it out, alright? I don’t want my men to get into any fights. So yeah, come back to me when you're done. I'll be here.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Awesome, brother, I won’t forget this!
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: Awesome, brother, I won’t forget this!
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 5ac: Hey there, brother, I have some stuff to deal with. There are a couple of guys with whom I really-really want to meet and discuss a couple of things, but these guys are very shy and won't get into any mess. Can you help me out with this matter? Just look around for any safe route for them so that nobody bothers them. Alright?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 successMessageT: Marvelous, young man. Thank you for the work.
data.{(string)616041eb031af660100c9967} succe: Marvelous, young man. Thank you for the work.
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 description 54c: Greetings, young man. My workers have to deliver several batches of valuable medicine, but I am too cautious to send them alone without making sure the path is safe. If you are available, then please help us, for the good of all civilians. You only have to scout the area and ensure a safe passage. Are you interested?
data.616041eb031af660100c9967 changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: There you are! You got everything? Good stuff.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: There you are! You got everything? Good stuff.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Hey there, come on in. Do you by any chance know of any magical place where you can always find whatever you need? There's an order for some supplies, and I've got no clue where to find them right now. Wanna help me out? For a reward, of course.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Marvelous, my friend. You have our thanks.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: Marvelous, my friend. You have our thanks.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 593: Good afternoon. I have an order for specific goods that the Blue Helmets would not be able to obtain. However, we have you, mercenary, and with your skills, it will be a breeze for you. Here is the list of the required items. Don't let me down.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Thank you, kid, good job. Here, that’s for the trouble.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: Thank you, kid, good job. Here, that’s for the trouble.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5c0: Hey there, kid. I'm running low on some of the supplies, some for my store, some for me. Can you help me out? Wait here, I'll make a list. Thank you.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Good work, mercenary. I owe you one.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: Good work, mercenary. I owe you one.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5a7: Hello, mercenary. Listen, I've got an order for various supplies, but I don't have some of them in stock for the moment. I'd be extremely grateful if you found them for me. Here's the list, all info is in there. Thank you.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Here's our errand boy. You've done good, mate.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: Here's our errand boy. You've done good, mate.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 583: Hey, wanna look for some goodies? I need to find some stuff, but my lads are all busy with the more important stuff. You, however, look like you're eager to help a friend out! C'mere, I'll draw you your shopping list. Off you go then.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: Ah, such a player, always helps a brother out!
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: Ah, such a player, always helps a brother out!
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 5ac: Hey, brother. I've got a big full-packed list of special goods for delivery, and the clients are still waiting. Can you go look for the needed stuff to help your best bro Arshavir?
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 successMessageT: You've done a good deed, mercenary.
data.{(string)61604635c725987e815b1a46} succe: You've done a good deed, mercenary.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. In our troubling times, it's hard to remain in abundance, you have to agree. I've received an order for a batch of specific resources, but I am unable to acquire them. Will you help us, mercenary? Here is a list of all needed items.
data.61604635c725987e815b1a46 changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Good work, my friend! Here’s your reward.
data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: Good work, my friend! Here’s your reward.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 593: Mercenary, there is a task for you. The Blue Helmets will be grateful if you, so to say, strengthen our relationships. There is a list of specific people without whom our business would be much easier. Get rid of them and report to me when you're done.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: So the only thing they want is to shoot each other. That’s just wrong. Well, kid, I know you at least tried.
data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: So the only thing they want is to shoot each other. That’s just wrong. Well, kid, I know you at least tried.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5c0: You know, we cannot rid Tarkov of the all-destroying parasites by ourselves. But what we can do is teach them a lesson and let them realize their mistakes however inhumane they were. And if those bandits don't want to talk - then to hell is the only road for them.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.

data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: You got the bastards? Good, here's your prize.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Greetings, soldier, I have a job for you. I've got some morons who I really don't want to deal with anymore. A type of work just for you. Can you help me out? Deal with those idiots, lemme give you the list of targets.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: A damn beast you are, hehe. Good work, here's your share.
data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: A damn beast you are, hehe. Good work, here's your share.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 583: Here he is, the one and only! Listen, brother, we're friends, right? And friends need to help each other out! So go help me out - I need to pop some morons, no questions asked, alright? You in?
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Nice, nice. Here, take this, a little thank you gift.
data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: Nice, nice. Here, take this, a little thank you gift.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 5ac: Gotta do something... Ah, salam, brother. Listen, can you help a brother out? My boys ran into some morons and as always, there was a big mess. Many good guys died, but what’s even worse is that those assholes stole all our looted clothes! Can't leave those fuckers unpunished, right? Go and pop those bitches.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f successMessageT: Is the job done? Good, then here is your reward.
data.{(string)616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f} succe: Is the job done? Good, then here is your reward.
data.616051e63f96cc089c1cf37f description 54c: Mercenary, you are just in time. We need help in eliminating a group of bandits who are interfering with our humanitarian operations. If you are not busy, then I will entrust this to you. All details are included.

data.616052ea3054fc0e2c24ce6e successMessageT: So the only thing they want is to shoot each other. That’s just wrong. Well, kid, I know you at least tried.

data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: A great report, mercenary. Good work.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: A great report, mercenary. Good work.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 593: Hello, soldier! Are you ready to help the people? Big goals start small. Please survey the marked location and find extraction points, this will help save dozens of lives.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: So, how is it? Got it. Here’s your reward then.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: So, how is it? Got it. Here’s your reward then.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Welcome, soldier! Can you help me out with a thing? Need to run around a place, check out the situation and escape routes. For what? Ain't you a nosy one. If I’m asking, it means I need it. The quicker you do it, the better.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Good one, what can I say.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: Good one, what can I say.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 583: Alright, listen up, mate, straight to the point. I need you to stroll somewhere and check out if the place is safe and all that.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: I’m glad you’re back. I’ve prepared something for you.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: I’m glad you’re back. I’ve prepared something for you.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5a7: Hello! It’s good that you’re here. I’ve ordered a bunch of spare parts for my work, they’ll be transported around here. Can you go there and check how safe the area is? I wouldn’t want to lose such cargo for nothing.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Perfect, brother! Here, take this, will be useful.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: Perfect, brother! Here, take this, will be useful.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5ac: Come on in, bro! How are things? I’m planning a big deal right now. But hell knows where to transport the stuff properly - the place is crawling with Scavs… Here, take a look at the map. You’ve been here recently? Check out the situation there, help a brother out, yeah?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Understood. Here, that’s for the help.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: Understood. Here, that’s for the help.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 5c0: Glad you came by. I don’t get many visitors. I myself would be covered by moss already if not for hunting. I’m packing up for one tomorrow, by the way. Can you scout the path? I’ll be going here on the map, wouldn’t want to catch a bullet. You’ve got a way clearer eyesight than me, kid. Let me know of anything you discover. Well, bless you then.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa successMessageT: Thank you for your work. You have helped to save several lives.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9aa} succe: Thank you for your work. You have helped to save several lives.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa description 54c: Good afternoon, young man. Are you able to help us? We’re stationing several seriously injured patients, and we won’t be able to extract them with our forces alone. We have to transfer them from the city, and there they will be taken away and taken to the hospital. Come again? No, you will not have to carry them yourself. You’ll only have to scout the area, the route along which my assistants will evacuate the injured.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9aa changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Thanks, comrade! The country won’t forget this.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Thanks, comrade! The country won’t forget this.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Where in the bloody hell is it… It’s always like that, always run out of things just as you need them… Hey, soldier! Can you help me find something?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Got it all? Lemme check. Nice, all here.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Got it all? Lemme check. Nice, all here.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 583: Aren’t you tired of sitting on your ass in the hideout all day? Hey, ease off, I’m just messing around! We’re best mates, you and I… You just knew that I needed some help. Need to find something. Here, hold on, I’ll write a list for you so that you don’t forget it halfway.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Hold on, I need to check the list. Yes, everything is here. You have my thanks.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Hold on, I need to check the list. Yes, everything is here. You have my thanks.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 593: Mercenary, I must ask for your help. My clients require these items, but for specific reasons, I cannot officially issue an order for the search.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Alright, show me. Yup, all here. Nice job!
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Alright, show me. Yup, all here. Nice job!
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5ac: Hey bro, wanna help out the good guys? Here, I have an order from them. Need to find everything from the list. Nah, it’s not super urgent.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Did you find it? Well I’ll be damned! A damn good man you are, soldier.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Did you find it? Well I’ll be damned! A damn good man you are, soldier.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5c0: Come on in, warrior. The tea is ready. Interested in what I’m writing here, huh? It’s just a list of what I need in the household. Something of this could be useful for business too, to send to the right people. Can you help me find some of it?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Have you found it all? You have my thanks, young man.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Have you found it all? You have my thanks, young man.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 54c: Yes, young man, something is constantly lacking in the time of war... If there is an excess of bandages - there are not enough antibiotics, if there are antibiotics - there are not enough basic food supplies. Let me write down what we need, and perhaps if you stumble upon any of this, can take this with you for us?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab successMessageT: Thank you! I knew I could count on you.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ab} succe: Thank you! I knew I could count on you.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab description 5a7: Hey, friend, I need your help again. I need to find some items from this list. I know that you’re a busy man, but if you do want to help me, I’d appreciate it if you did it immediately.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ab changeQuestMess: A pity, certainly. I wanted to ask you specifically to do this job… I really started to like working with you. Don’t rush to refuse though, okay? Maybe things will change.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 54c: Come on in, don’t just stand in the doorway, dammit. Why am I so moody today, you ask? Well, I’ve got a rat problem… People don’t know where they shouldn’t stick their hands in. Maybe you could help me out with this? I’ll get you something in return.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: What do you mean you refuse? Soldier, soldier… use your head: who would protect the Motherland if not you? Think this through again.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Get your reward then. Better than a Christmas present, hehe!
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ad} succe: Get your reward then. Better than a Christmas present, hehe!
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 583: I have a matter to deal with. I’ll entrust it to you, so keep your mouth shut. Need to smoke some morons, no fuss no muss. Huh? Of course, they deserved that.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: What, pussied out? I knew you wouldn’t have the balls for this. Alright, since you’re so sissy about it, I’ll give you another job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 593: Are you looking for work, mercenary? There is something of your caliber. We require the elimination of several dangerous individuals known to have been participating in civilian killings. Is the task clear? And make sure to keep yourself safe - you’re a valuable employee, it would be a shame to lose you.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: I wouldn’t want to waste time looking for another worker. Are you sure you want to put me into such a complicated situation, mercenary?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Thank you, brother. Took care of those bastards.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ad} succe: Thank you, brother. Took care of those bastards.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 5ac: Help me out, brother, will you? I relied on some assholes by mistake. They ran off with the goods. Not only did they kill my people, but now they’re going around and letting everyone know how easily they screwed Arshavir over. Those morons have to go. You can keep whatever you find on them, I’ll reward you for the job too, for real.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: Look how picky this guy is. “This one I’ll do, this one I won’t”. Earlier you were eager to do any of my “find and give” tasks. Yo, don’t even look at me as if I’m lying right now!
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: Oh, well. Looks like there’s no end to this scum. You didn’t get hit, at least?
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ad} succe: Oh, well. Looks like there’s no end to this scum. You didn’t get hit, at least?
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 5c0: Was just thinking of you right now. Every time you leave me, I’m wondering if you’ll return or get killed like others. Hey, I’m not a pessimist. It’s just that there is another new gang, as people say. I’m still hoping that they are wrong. People can’t get into gangs forever, right? It has to stop eventually.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: Ah, you know, while I was explaining the situation, I’ve already noticed in your eyes that you’re doubting whether to take the task or not. How bothersome, I’ll have to look for another man for this job.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad successMessageT: The bandits were eliminated? You have my thanks.
data.{(string)6180385770bf5a029372b9ad} succe: The bandits were eliminated? You have my thanks.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad description 54c: I need a person that is able to do hard work without unnecessary emotions. A group of people of unknown nationality constantly disrupts the supply of medicines. I’ll be frank: they kill couriers and take medicines for themselves. Mercenary, this arbitrariness must be stopped.
data.6180385770bf5a029372b9ad changeQuestMess: Young man, now is not the time for hasty decisions. Think about this carefully, weigh all the options. But do not take too long - the matter is urgent, so I will have to look for a better employee if you refuse.
